categories.name: Acrobat
categories.mystic_dialogue: I once performed in a Circus.

talents.name: Time To Go
talents.description: Taking a life grants a speed boost for 10 seconds. Taking a player's life doubles the speed boost and the duration.
hint: The speed boost is represented by a red glow around the player's eyes.
Can stack with itself, so killing a large group of mobs such as those in the Duke's Manor will grant a tremendous speed boost

talents.name: Kick Off
talents.description: You easily brush off shorter falls, taking no damage. Your first wall jump will always send you higher than normal. Gain a speed boost after wall jumping over a wall.
hint: While not mentioned in the Talent description, your climb height increases when you slide jump.
You can fall further before incurring fall damage.
3 Second cooldown.

talents.name: Steady Footing
talents.description: You're much more resistant to being pushed around.
hint: Knockback effects are reduced. Friction reduction from ice sheets is negated.

categories.name: Adaptive Arsenal
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Adaptive Arsenal.

talents.name: Exposed Durability
talents.description: Deal 10% more damage to opponents with no armor durability left.
hint: Also affect players with no outfit (Stranded Outfit)
Procs on your basic attacks while you have Berserk active.

talents.name: An Ironsinger's Instinct
talents.description: Successfully dodging an attack coats you in metal and reduces the damage of the next attack taken.
hint: 18s CD

talents.name: Phantom Edge
talents.description: Your weapon M1's have +0.25 range.

categories.name: Adept Caster
categories.mystic_dialogue: I fight from afar.

talents.name: Everchanging Aegis
talents.description: You take 20% less from attacks the same element as the last element you were hit with, but 10% more damage from attacks from different element.
hint: Procs when hit by a mantra that is not within the Attunementless category.
Doesn't reduce phys DMG from mantras, only elemental.
Getting hit by another element immediately changes your resistance.
Resistance is indicated by a colored shield:
Flamecharm: Orange, Frostdraw: Blue, Thundercall: Yellow, Galebreathe: Green, Shadowcast: Purple, Ironsing: Grey, Bloodrend: Red
Does not affect Oath, Attunement-less, or Monster mantras.

talents.name: Overflowing Dam
talents.description: Having full Ether for 2 seconds or more grants an aura to your attacks that grant them 10% more damage.
hint: Doesn't require you to wait for 2s upon reaching 100% ether; the buff applies immediately.
Damage buff is lowered to 5% for Silenthearts.
The arms equipment 'Warlock's Mantle' has this Talent.

talents.name: Perfect Flash
talents.description: Having over 95% health causes your mantras to do +25% damage. This bonus scales down to 10% if enemies are far away.

talents.name: Neural Overload
talents.description: You can input up to 4 copies of each Mantra ingredient instead of being limited to 3. The Mantra modifiers limit increases from 3 to 4.
hint: Rerolling this Talent will not affect the number of modifiers on your mantras.
Does NOT change the 12 mantra modification limit.

categories.name: Aerial Dancer
categories.mystic_dialogue: I dance with the winds.

talents.name: Wyvern's Claw
talents.description: You deal 10% more damage while airborne. Mantras receive a 5% damage increase instead.
hint: Synergizes well with air dashing or mantras that send both user and target in the air.
talents.requirement: 15 Strength, 25 Light Weapon OR 25 Medium Weapon OR 25 Heavy Weapon

categories.name: Aeromancer
categories.mystic_dialogue: I am a master of the winds.

talents.name: Aerogliding
talents.description: When falling from a high place, hold spacebar to generate wind currents until you hit the floor.
hint: Reduces falling speed and prevents fall damage.
Provides a small forward momentum.
Has 1s windup.
Automatically ends after 5 seconds (can be reactivated up to 3 times).
The Old Wind Talent has been merged with Aerogliding.
Greatly reduces height loss with a glider.

talents.name: Gale Trap
talents.description: Knocking a player tags them with a wind trap, causing anyone who picks up that body to be sent flying, but if you pick up the body, you gain a speed boost for 20 seconds.
hint: Cancels pickup for ~3s and can be activated multiple times.

talents.name: Aeronade
talents.description: Your Galetrap automatically detonates on contact with an object.
hint: Instead of sticking to surfaces, it activates upon contact with any object.

talents.name: Vacuum Punch
talents.description: Your Gale Punch pulls enemies in before you hit them.
hint: Gale Punch now pulls players towards you during the windup (cannot be feinted).

talents.name: Suffocating Impact
talents.description: When flourishing enemies into walls, they are suffocated and winded for a short duration.

talents.name: Stifled Jump
talents.description: Enemies who jump while suffocated by you are dazed.
hint: Also cancels all momentum from jumping.

categories.name: Alchemist
categories.mystic_dialogue: I enjoy mixing potions.

talents.name: Apothecary
talents.description: Potions you prepare will have amplified positive effects when consumed, and amplified negative effects when thrown.
hint: The head equipment 'Alchemist's Hat' and 'Big Alchemist's Hat' have this Talent.

talents.name: Chain Reaction
talents.description: When applying a potion effect to someone who already has one, the new effect is amplified. You have a 25% chance not to deplete potions when drinking them.
hint: Procs on any player with a potion effect and does not replace the current effect.
Merged with the old Taste Test Talent.

talents.name: Chemist's Bag
talents.description: You no longer drop Potions on death.

talents.name: Placebo Effect
talents.description: Drinking potions near allies will share the potion's effect with them.
hint: Reworked to have 100% chance of proccing (formerly 25%).
Also procs potion sickness, causing allies to throw up if they've recently ingested a potion.

talents.name: Potion Quaffer
talents.description: You're accustomed to drinking toxic fluids quickly, granting superior regenerative effects and faster potion consumption.
hint: Increases the strength of regeneration potion ingredients.
Merged with the old Subsistence Talent.
talents.requirement: Drank potion, 15 Fortitude OR 15 Willpower, 30 intelligence

talents.name: Wild Alchemy
talents.description: You have a chance to brew 2 potions instead of 1.
hint: Around ~20-25% chance. Gives a duplicate of the created potion.

categories.name: Alley Cat
categories.mystic_dialogue: I skulk in alleyways, looking for my next prize.

talents.name: Scaredy Cat
talents.description: When enemies initiate a fight first, gain a speed boost.
hint: The enemy must not be in combat to trigger this effect.

talents.name: Endurance Runner
talents.description: Even when things look dire, you still have it in you to keep your legs moving.
hint: Halves the speed penalty tied to lost health.
The leg equipment 'Mercenary's Boots' has this Talent.

talents.name: Conditioned Runner
talents.description: You regenerate health faster than normal when sprinting below 75% HP.
hint: After 3 seconds without taking damage, gain 300% health regen while running.
Reduced healing in PVP combat.

categories.name: All-Knowing
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of All-Knowing.

talents.name: Approaching Singularity
talents.description: You now gain +1% Mantra PEN for every 10 points of Intelligence. (0.1% per point)

categories.name: Amoran Seeker
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek out Amorus Pleeksty.

talents.name: Flame Within
talents.description: An application of Pleeksty's concept of the inner flame, also known as the soul of man. Set yourself ablaze to gain 10% extra damage and 10% extra speed. Unlike normal burn, it isn’t cleared by rolling/sliding and lasts until 30 seconds pass or it’s reused. It grants a mobility buff (not a speed boost) and applies its damage buff to mantras. Can be enabled while knocked and is meant to synergize with Phoenix Flames, lowering their healing by 25%. Merged with Last Laugh.
hint: 7 second cooldown if you clear the flames by reusing the tool; no cooldown if it ends naturally.

categories.name: Angler
categories.mystic_dialogue: I am a simple fisherman.

talents.name: Fisher's Lure
talents.description: Fish are drawn to your line more quickly.
hint: Obtained after fishing 50 times successfully.
Increases the rate of hooking something while fishing.

talents.name: Hook, Line, and Sinker
talents.description: Once something's caught your line, it's much harder to get loose.
hint: Obtained after fishing 30 times successfully.
Reduces the chance of failure while fishing.

talents.name: Proficient Baiting
talents.description: Casting your line excites ocean life, reducing the chances of fishing up trash.
hint: Obtained after fishing 10 times successfully.
Reduces the likelihood of fishing up trash items such as Seaweed or Leather Boots.

categories.name: Annihilator
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Annihilator.

talents.name: Collapsed Lung
talents.description: Block breaking an opponent closes off their ability to Vent for 3s. Duration scales with strength investment: with 75 Strength it lasts 2s, and every point above 75 adds 0.04s up to 3s at 100 Strength.

categories.name: Apex Predator
categories.mystic_dialogue: My hunt is inescapable.

talents.name: Carnivore
talents.description: In exchange for losing the ability to eat vegetation, you sate your hunger by gripping monsters and people alike. (Also, you gain hunger and thirst when credited for kills.) Obtaining the 'Vegetarian' flaw removes this talent.

talents.name: Grand Feast
talents.description: Regain tempo, ether, blood and health when gaining hunger from killing.
hint: Healing is negated in PVP combat.
40% tempo gain, 55% ether gain, 3% blood gain, 5% health gain.

talents.name: Sunken Predator
talents.description: Enemies you hit in water or the depths have their speed buffs nullified and are slowed.
hint: Monsters are greatly slowed for a few seconds; players are slowed a little.

categories.name: Artisan
categories.mystic_dialogue: I am an artist.

talents.name: Master Craftsman
talents.description: Your skills alone substitute the need for a Craft Station. You can craft without one.

categories.name: Assassin
categories.mystic_dialogue: I prefer to attack unseen.

talents.name: Deep Wound
talents.description: Assassinating a target applies anti-heal for 20s and gives a 6s speed boost. Damage scales with level, allowing high-damage one-shots on tanky foes.
hint: The head equipment 'Assassin's Hood' has this Talent.

talents.name: Lowstride
talents.description: Speed during crouching is increased and unsheathing a weapon becomes silent, boosting stealth.
hint: Crouching is now as fast as walking and already increases stealth.

talents.name: Lights Out
talents.description: Assassinations now grant 30% PEN and blind the target for 5s.

talents.name: Unseen Threat
talents.description: You can assassinate foes with weapons drawn, causing them to be slowed and unable to jump for 3s. (Bypasses in-combat immunity.) Merged with Low Blow.

categories.name: Athlete
categories.mystic_dialogue: I am athletic.

talents.name: Triathlete
talents.description: You swim faster in water.

talents.name: Pitcher
talents.description: You can throw things further.
hint: Requires: 5 Strength, 5 Agility, and hitting a target with a thrown object.
The head Equipment 'Alchemist's Hat' and 'Big Alchemist's Hat' have this Talent.

categories.name: Authority Interrogator
categories.mystic_dialogue: I work for the Authority.

talents.name: Authority Intimidation
talents.description: All moves that apply electricity slow the opponent more.

talents.name: Second Interrogation
talents.description: Electrified attacks do 50% less damage and posture damage to you. Does not stack with Resolve Crusher's damage reduction and only applies to weapon attacks.

talents.name: Resolve Crusher
talents.description: Lightning moves now apply stacks of 'Resolve Crusher'. At 4 stacks, you apply 'Electrified' to your opponent. Attacks from Electrified foes are converted into lightning damage, but deal 10% less damage. Stacks last 5 seconds each (reset if not renewed), and when fully built (after 5 stacks) the effect lasts 4 seconds.

talents.name: First Interrogation
talents.description: Attacks from Electrified opponents grant you ether proportional to their initial damage, even if blocked, parried, or dodged.

categories.name: Bastion
categories.mystic_dialogue: I am an everlasting bastion.

talents.name: Battle Tendency
talents.description: You can breathe more easily with +20% faster posture regen.

talents.name: Braced Collapse
talents.description: After being block broken, the next attack to hit you deals reduced damage (approximately 20% less). Works only for the first hit.

talents.name: Moving Fortress
talents.description: Blocking no longer slows you down as much.

talents.name: Perseverance
talents.description: When you're knocked down, you get back up more quickly.
hint: Cooldown scales with Willpower (max 100) and is reduced by 1 second by Brick Wall.
Time knocked is reduced by 25%.

talents.name: Reinforced Armor
talents.description: Incoming PEN is reduced by 30%.
hint: Scales linearly: 10% PEN reduction at 65 FTD, +0.8% per point above 65 up to 30% at 90 FTD.
Does not reduce damage that bypasses armor (e.g. Oath damage).

categories.name: Blindseer
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Blindseer.

talents.name: All-Seeing Eye
talents.description: The mystic eye through which you see can perceive the imperceptible; invisible foes are highlighted.
talents.requirement: Help 4 Pathfinders in the Depths Trial

categories.name: Berserker
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Berserker.

talents.name: Berserk
talents.description: Succumb to burning rage: nullify your own armor in exchange for nullifying that of your foes, granting your Criticals +10% PEN while active. (Only basic attacks are affected, not mantras.)
hint: Activation removes armor for 20 seconds (or 10 seconds if stat requirement not met).
Visual effects: red eyes and hair; may bug the Armor bar if toggled too quickly.

categories.name: Bloodhound
categories.mystic_dialogue: The scent of my enemy is still fresh.

talents.name: Bloodwarden's Sense
talents.description: Enemies you attack with a mantra above 60% Blood Poisoning are highlighted red briefly.

talents.name: Smell of Blood
talents.description: When someone touches a blood pool, they briefly reveal their blood and blood poison.

categories.name: Bloodrender
categories.mystic_dialogue: I obtained the forbidden knowledge of Bloodrending.

talents.name: Adept Bloodrender
talents.description: You can now obtain 1-star Bloodrender mantras.

talents.name: Bloodrender
talents.description: Grants you the ability to command Blood: your Bloodrend mantras replenish, steal, and apply 'Blood Poisoning'.
talents.requirement: 1 Bloodrend or via Bloodrend trainer Vyrelda

talents.name: Crimson Fountain
talents.description: Block breaking or flourishing an enemy spills a pool of blood beneath them.

talents.name: Expert Bloodrender
talents.description: You can now obtain 2-star Bloodrender mantras.

talents.name: First Blood
talents.description: Your first blood mantra used in combat has no blood cost.

talents.name: Hemorrhaging Blow
talents.description: Block breaking with a blood mantra turns your opponent's healing into damage for 8 seconds.
hint: Cooldown: 55 seconds.

talents.name: Master Bloodrender
talents.description: You can now obtain 3-star Bloodrender mantras. Your maximum blood capacity is increased by 25% and you regenerate blood faster. (+5 Health)

talents.name: Rush Hour
talents.description: Stab yourself to become stronger, faster, and deal increased blood bar damage. Grants a tool, drains HP and blood, boosts damage and speed, and recovers blood when dealing damage.

talents.name: Sanguine Siphon
talents.description: Landing a critical in a blood pool empowers your next blood mantra with an additional 20% damage.

talents.name: Sheltering Grasp
talents.description: Blood mantras cast within blood pools have a reduced blood cost.

categories.name: Bloodsong
categories.mystic_dialogue: The elements crave the blood of others.

talents.name: Blood and Iron
talents.description: Pulling rods out of your opponent replenishes an equivalent amount of your blood.

talents.name: Brain Death
talents.description: Enemies already suffocated have their suffocation duration extended when hit by a bloodrend mantra.

talents.name: Cold Blooded
talents.description: Chilled enemies passively lose blood or have blood taken from them when their crystals explode.

talents.name: Electrolyte
talents.description: Hitting Bloodrend mantras while having temporary health applies electrify and removes a portion of that temporary health.

talents.name: Malevolent Sapper
talents.description: The more blood poisoning your opponent has, the more ether your shadow mantras steal from them.

talents.name: Scorchblood
talents.description: Guardbreaking with a bloodrend mantra sets the opponent on fire.

categories.name: Brawler
categories.mystic_dialogue: I do not need a weapon.

talents.name: Bruiser's Mixup
talents.description: Switching your Fist Style mid-fight makes your basic Fist attacks inflict bleed temporarily.
hint: Procs by pressing Y.
Does not work with Jus Karita.

talents.name: Trained Fist
talents.description: You can now equip Cestus.
hint: Granted by equipping any Fist weapon (excluding Jus Karita) or via starting quests.

categories.name: Bruiser
categories.mystic_dialogue: I am a master with my hands.

talents.name: Brazen Blow
talents.description: Attacking an enemy slowed by your Greataxe grants you temporary hyperarmor.
hint: 20 second cooldown.
Procs via bleed effects from Greataxe hits.
talents.requirement: Use a Greataxe, Impairing Blow, 30 Heavy Weapon

talents.name: Heavy Fatigue
talents.description: Hitting an enemy slowed by your Greataxe temporarily reduces how far they can roll.
talents.requirement: Use a Greataxe, Impairing Blow, 40 Heavy Weapon

talents.name: Impairing Blow
talents.description: Basic attacks with your Greataxe slow your enemy for 2 seconds (3s for running attacks) and add +20% posture damage against them.

talents.name: Rending Impact
talents.description: Block breaking an enemy with your Greataxe applies knockdown.

categories.name: Bulwark
categories.mystic_dialogue: I am the one to hold the walls.

talents.name: Defensive Reprisal
talents.description: Being flourished grants you 10% posture resistance for 5 seconds.

talents.name: Dancing Guard
talents.description: Parrying an opponent and then another enemy in quick succession applies a slow for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Down to your Level
talents.description: When you have a speed debuff, your basic attacks slow your enemies for 2 seconds.

talents.name: Knuckle Guard
talents.description: Hitting dazed enemies grants you 10% posture resistance for 5 seconds.

categories.name: Butterfly
categories.mystic_dialogue: Light on my feet, I sting like a bee.

talents.name: Swift Rebound
talents.description: Move faster after successfully dodging an attack.

talents.name: Evasive Expert
talents.description: Your speed boost from dodging is increased.

talents.name: Risky Moves
talents.description: A successful dodge automatically grants the next dodge. (Cancels upon attack)
hint: Has mutual exclusivity with Observation and Safety Dance.
20 second cooldown.

talents.name: Ghost
talents.description: Dodging an attack briefly makes you invisible until you attack.
hint: Provides invulnerability frames for 2 seconds.
Cannot parry while invisible.

categories.name: Champion
categories.mystic_dialogue: I have never lost.

talents.name: Underdog
talents.description: Deal 3% more damage to foes with higher HP and +10% more damage to physically larger targets.

talents.name: Champion's Regalia
talents.description: Flourishing an opponent grants you 1.5x posture damage for 10 seconds.
hint: Only applies if you successfully hit with a flourish.
Does not work on parry, block, or dodge hits.

talents.name: Defiance
talents.description: Negative status effects are half as effective when you are below 35% HP.
hint: Cuts durations for various effects (burn, chill, suffocation, etc.).

categories.name: Charm Caster
categories.mystic_dialogue: I use the song to charm others.

talents.name: Chaotic Charm
talents.description: When attacked at low health, enemies take 20% less damage while others take 20% more damage from their hits.

talents.name: Charismatic Cast
talents.description: Landing mantras on enemies charms them, reducing damage they deal to you.

talents.name: Lasting Charisma
talents.description: Enemies charmed by your mantras remain charmed for a longer duration.
hint: Doubles the charm duration from 7.5s to 15s.
Counteracted by the Disbelief Talent.

talents.name: Tough Love
talents.description: Deal 10% more damage to enemies charmed by you, and your mantras deal an extra 5% damage.
hint: This talent is mutually exclusive with Narcissist.

talents.name: Dazing Finisher
talents.description: Flourishing enemies charmed by you results in dazing them instead of knocking them back.
hint: Prevents knocking back charmed players.
Mutually exclusive with Bulldozer.

talents.name: Christmas Miracle
talents.description: Christmas Mod Shop reward that regenerates hunger and thirst. (Says: 'Thank you so much K1!')
hint: Grants access to the Christmas Miracle tool.

categories.name: Cold Phantom
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Cold Phantom.

talents.name: Freezing Wight
talents.description: Your Haunted Gale now procs Chilled, with a 7-second duration. Also procs Frozen Legs and applies 1 Crystal if used with the Crystallization path (and works with Specter path's Apparitions).

categories.name: Colossus
categories.mystic_dialogue: I stand far above others, an insurmountable challenge.

talents.name: Destructive Recovery
talents.description: [Greatsword] Enemies recover an additional 50% less when parrying.
talents.requirement: 25 Strength & 40 Heavy Weapon, Harsh Response, Use a Greatsword

talents.name: Unstoppable Force
talents.description: [Greathammer] You take 15% less posture damage when parried.
talents.requirement: 25 Strength & 40 Heavy Weapon, Unwavering Resolve, Use a Greathammer

talents.name: Harsh Response
talents.description: Enemies receive less posture back when parrying your attacks.

talents.name: Heavy Hitter
talents.description: [Heavy Weapons] Your posture damage is increased by 10% on every heavy weapon attack.

categories.name: Comrade
categories.mystic_dialogue: I am a friend to others.

talents.name: Lord's Tithe
talents.description: Allies and enemies you Reinforce are drained of their Ether until you are fully charged. (Effect cancels if victims drop below 5% Ether.)
hint: Getting hit cancels the effect.
Note: Reinforce (Mantra) requires 50 Fortitude even though the talent lists 40.

talents.name: Grand Support
talents.description: Everyone you buff with Reinforce is healed slightly; you also heal when healing others.
hint: Hold F while casting Reinforce to affect all, including non-allies.
Note: Reinforce requires 50 Fortitude despite the talent listing 40.

categories.name: Cosmic Wind
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Cosmic Wind.

talents.name: Pressure Detonation
talents.description: Block breaking an opponent with a Shadow mantra generates a small vacuum that suffocates those hit and steals their Tempo.

categories.name: Critical Specialist
categories.mystic_dialogue: I am a master of creating openings.

talents.name: Finishing Touch
talents.description: [Dagger] Instantly execute enemies finished with your dagger’s critical attack.

talents.name: Knife's Journey
talents.description: [Daggers] Cancelling an enemy's Mantra windup with your basic attacks deals 15% more damage.

talents.name: Decisive Blow
talents.description: Hitting an enemy with your Critical Attack immediately after they dodge procs Knife's Journey, dealing double armor damage.

talents.name: Successive Throw
talents.description: When you successfully flourish an enemy, you throw out a dagger afterwards.

categories.name: Cryomancer
categories.mystic_dialogue: I command the cold.

talents.name: Fragile Freeze
talents.description: Your ice Mantras freeze opponents upon block breaking.

talents.name: Chilling Flourish
talents.description: When flourishing an enemy, they leave behind a trail of ice patches.

talents.name: Spike Traps
talents.description: Press F during the windup of Ice Spikes to create traps around you instead of a single spike.
hint: Extends Ice Spike cooldown from 5s to 20s.

talents.name: Condensation Drip
talents.description: Passively collect condensation from the air, greatly reducing your thirst.

talents.name: Cool Head
talents.description: If set on fire while on ice, immediately put it out and enter a state of chill.
hint: 15s cooldown after burn immunity ends.

categories.name: Cryonic
categories.mystic_dialogue: Those that step on my ice know that they have made a grave error.

talents.name: Cryostasis
talents.description: When block broken, freeze yourself to reduce incoming damage by 50% and deal frost damage to attackers.

talents.name: Preceding Chill
talents.description: Enemies hit in the final moments of your ice beam are frozen.

categories.name: Cutthroat
categories.mystic_dialogue: I am ruthless. A knife for hire.

talents.name: Blood Thirsty
talents.description: Gain a speed boost after causing heavy blood loss.
hint: "Heavy Bloodloss" refers to roughly 1 bar of blood.

talents.name: In a Hurry
talents.description: You grip faster with a movement speed boost.
hint: Reduces grip time by 0.5 seconds (≈16.67% faster).

talents.name: Muffled Screams
talents.description: You quiet the cries of those you execute, reducing the range at which their allies are alerted and diminishing the effectiveness of talents that slow your executions.

categories.name: Darksiphon
categories.mystic_dialogue: I feed on the souls of my enemies.

talents.name: Blighted Song
talents.description: Attaching your Shadow Chains to enemies disables both yours and the enemy's ability to cast mantras.

talents.name: Dark God
talents.description: If a Shadowcast mantra would drain your opponent's Ether to 0, it instead drains from their Tempo and increases your Tempo.

categories.name: Dawnwalker
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Dawnwalker.

talents.name: Absolute Radiance
talents.description: Dealing damage with Dawnwalker mantras briefly makes you immune to all elemental effects.

talents.name: Protagonist Syndrome
talents.description: Your Dawnwalker mantras are empowered after you are hit by Shadowcast.

talents.name: Luminous Flash
talents.description: After dealing a certain amount of damage in Absolute Radiance, you gain a chance to empower your strikes with pure light.

categories.name: Death Speaker
categories.mystic_dialogue: I am the one who speaks to death.

talents.name: Blackhole
talents.description: Your singularity pulls everyone nearby in.

talents.name: Energy Siphon
talents.description: Your singularity now also pulls ether from extra players affected by it.

categories.name: Deepwoken
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Deepwoken.

talents.name: Spell Shout
talents.description: You now shout your mantra's name upon cast, with auto-formatting for proper capitalization.

talents.name: The Sound from Below
talents.description: You can hear it pounding in your head.

categories.name: Doomsday Engine
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Doomsday Engine.

talents.name: Frozen Web
talents.description: Landing a critical with a Static Link applies Chilled, bottom freeze, and fragile freeze.

categories.name: Duelist
categories.mystic_dialogue: I am a competent duelist.

talents.name: Concussion
talents.description: Enemies you flourish into walls have their vision altered and are dazed longer than usual.

talents.name: Concussive Force
talents.description: Enemies you knock down remain downed for 15 seconds instead of 10.

talents.name: Duelist's Dance
talents.description: Parrying an opponent gives you 25% more posture back.

talents.name: Precise Swing
talents.description: After landing a critical, your next light attack gains extra chip damage.

talents.name: Spine Cutter
talents.description: Hitting an enemy in the back after a roll cancel initiates a second slash dealing raw damage.
hint: 5s cooldown per enemy in PVP; per enemy type in PVE.

categories.name: Pursuer
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Pursuer.

talents.name: Going Nowhere
talents.description: When enemies dodge your attacks, their momentum is nullified and they are briefly unable to sprint.

categories.name: Duelist Flame
categories.mystic_dialogue: My flame fights for me.

talents.name: Concussive Flash
talents.description: Your blinding light now concusses foes.

categories.name: Elementalist
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Elementalist.

talents.name: Ether Overdrive
talents.description: Gain 5% extra PEN and remove the cap on your PEN, going beyond your limits.
hint: Removes 50% mantra and physical PEN cap similar to Million Ton Piercer.
Mutually exclusive with Million Ton Piercer.

categories.name: Empath
categories.mystic_dialogue: I feel the pain of those around me.

talents.name: Give and Take
talents.description: Deal less damage to comrades and receive less damage from them.
hint: Stacks with similar innate talents up to a cap.

talents.name: Off Your Game
talents.description: Slow taunted enemies when you hit them.

categories.name: Escape Artist
categories.mystic_dialogue: I wish to escape.

talents.name: Robber Baron
talents.description: You hold onto more items when defeated, reducing item loss and note loss.
hint: Stacks with equipment that have this talent.

categories.name: Ether Adept
categories.mystic_dialogue: I am an expert on ether.

talents.name: Charged Return
talents.description: When under an elemental status, your M1 and critical attacks deal 10% more damage.
hint: Procs on Burn, Chill, Shock, etc., and on some self-inflicted statuses.

talents.name: Ether Absorption
talents.description: Receive ether back when you take damage from mantras.

categories.name: Falling Star Guard
categories.mystic_dialogue: I protect the ones who follow the light.

talents.name: Falling Star Guard
talents.description: Your defenses improve as you fall, reducing damage.
hint: Details on scaling or additional effects may apply.

categories.name: Fang and Coil
categories.mystic_dialogue: I adopt the path of the serpent.

talents.name: Fang and Coil
talents.description: Grants you the ability to use the Fang and Coil fist style.
hint: Requires 20 Light Weapon, Friend Etris Reputation, defeat The Doom of Caeranthil and speak to Vesque.

categories.name: Fish
categories.mystic_dialogue: I enjoy sea food.

talents.name: Fishman
talents.description: Execute enemies in water and gain additional healing from kills.
hint: Allows you to drown foes, overcoming the usual inability to grip in water.

categories.name: Flame Dancer
categories.mystic_dialogue: I dance with the flames.

talents.name: Dancing Steps
talents.description: Fire mantras now move you in the direction you face.

talents.name: Graceful Steps
talents.description: Your dancing steps grant a faster speed boost, even triggering without sufficient ether.

categories.name: Flame Warden
categories.mystic_dialogue: None will escape my flames.

talents.name: Cauterized Wounds
talents.description: Reduces blood loss from all sources.
hint: Effectiveness reduced if No Life King enchant is applied.
Stacks with Alloyblood.

talents.name: Flamewalker
talents.description: While Warding Radiance is active, you leave trails of flame when sliding.

categories.name: Flamecharmer
categories.mystic_dialogue: I speak to the flames.

talents.name: Adept Flamecharmer
talents.description: You can now obtain 1-Star Leveled Flamecharmer Mantras.

talents.name: Azure Flames
talents.description: Many of your flames turn blue, increasing their intensity and burn damage.
hint: With the Lava Serpent path, explosions occur faster with a bigger radius.

talents.name: Expert Flamecharmer
talents.description: You can now obtain 2-Star Leveled Flamecharmer Mantras.

categories.name: Flashfreeze
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of FlashFreeze.

talents.name: Temperature Shock
talents.description: Your fire mantras now detonate any stacked crystals.

categories.name: Freak Of Nature
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Human Architecture.

talents.name: Exoskeleton
talents.description: You gain fortified Natural Armor that regenerates when you rest, resisting 10% Physical Damage when active.
hint: Durability scales with power from 315 to 600 and stacks with Vesperian's Chitin.

categories.name: Frost Forger
categories.mystic_dialogue: I survive off the frozen Elements.

talents.name: Glacial Finish
talents.description: Press F while using your Ice Smash Mantra to deliver a devastating follow-up attack.

categories.name: Frostdrawer
categories.mystic_dialogue: I speak to the frost.

talents.name: Adept Frostdrawer
talents.description: You can now obtain 1-Star Leveled Frostdrawer Mantras.

talents.name: Cold Front
talents.description: Your vent creates an ice patch that applies Chill to enemies.

talents.name: Expert Frostdrawer
talents.description: You can now obtain 2-Star Leveled Frostdrawer Mantras.

categories.name: Frozen Lightning
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Frozen Lightning.

talents.name: Fulgurite Formation
talents.description: When your crystals explode, lightning strikes your foes. Also, your crystals apply extra effects for 8 seconds.
talents.requirement: Glass Path: Crystallization, Surge Path: Unstable Capacitor, 50 Frostdraw, 50 Thundercall

categories.name: Frostthorn
categories.mystic_dialogue: My ice protects like a flower growing thorns.

talents.name: Glacial Coasting
talents.description: Sliding while Orbital Ice is active leaves trails of ice, granting a bonus to passive agility and health.

categories.name: Frozen Warrior
categories.mystic_dialogue: I feel like a warrior encased in ice.

talents.name: Frozen Legs
talents.description: Your slow effect prevents your opponents from rolling; only procs off mantras.

categories.name: Gale Duelist
categories.mystic_dialogue: My wind fights for me.

talents.name: Tempest Wind
talents.description: Cast Wind Blade while sliding to unleash a quick whirlwind attack; also procs after a slide jump.

categories.name: Gale Kata
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Gale Kata.

talents.name: Legion Kata
talents.description: Gain the ability to use the Legion's martial arts (a fist style) by speaking with Amara and having the Captain's Recc.
talents.requirement: Captain's Recc in inventory; interaction with Amara

categories.name: Galebreather
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Galebreathe Master.

talents.name: Adept Galebreather
talents.description: You can now obtain 1-Star Leveled Galebreathe mantras.

talents.name: Expert Galebreather
talents.description: You can now obtain 2-Star Leveled Galebreathe mantras.

talents.name: Galebreather
talents.description: Grants you the ability to command wind as a Galebreather.
talents.requirement: Galebreathe at Power 1 or via trainer

talents.name: Master Galebreather
talents.description: You can now obtain 3-Star Leveled Galebreathe mantras, increasing your health by 5.

categories.name: Galeforce
categories.mystic_dialogue: I use the winds to enforce my will.

talents.name: After Cut
talents.description: If a physical attack hits, it applies an 'after cut' that deals extra damage (10% for physical, 5% for mantra attacks).
hint: This is a secondary hit that bypasses damage modifiers.

talents.name: Breathing Impact
talents.description: When knocked into objects by wind mantras, enemies take additional blunt damage based on impact force.

talents.name: Inhale
talents.description: Cancelling a wind spell stores its power, empowering the next wind spell cast with bonus damage based on the mantra's level.
hint: Also grants a 3-second speed boost.

categories.name: Genius Intellect
categories.mystic_dialogue: My brains are my strength.

talents.name: Neuroplasticity
talents.description: Reduces the ether cost of additional modifications to your mantras by 20% and grants an extra Wildcard Mantra slot.
hint: Applies only to modifications done after obtaining this talent.

categories.name: Glassdancer
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the elegance of a Glassdancer.

talents.name: Glass Path: Crystallization
talents.description: Your ice abilities cause red ice crystals to form on enemies instead of slowing them; 5 crystals cause an explosion.
hint: Each crystal deals base damage of 3 with scaling; 1s cooldown on explosion proc.
Mutually exclusive with Unyielding Frost.

talents.name: Crystal Shrapnel
talents.description: Your crystal explosions now have an AoE that applies crystals to all enemies hit.

talents.name: Reclaimed Glass
talents.description: Crystal Shrapnel explosions grant you and allies 10% Elemental Resistance for 10 seconds.

categories.name: Great Wall
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Great Wall.

talents.name: Fortitude Unbounded
talents.description: You surpass your limits and train your fortitude to its fullest.

categories.name: Gunslinger
categories.mystic_dialogue: I always shoot first.

talents.name: Armor Piercing
talents.description: [Guns] Your gun attacks ignore 10% of an opponent's physical armor, applied multiplicatively before PEN.
hint: Does not work if PEN cap (50%) is reached.

talents.name: Bulletproof
talents.description: You take no armor damage from guns.

categories.name: Hammer Rage
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Hammer Rage.

talents.name: Brain Rattler
talents.description: Guardbreaking with your critical rattles your opponent's brain, increasing blood loss and blurring their vision.
hint: Procs on all guard breaks (may be bugged).

talents.name: Dispatch
talents.description: Bear Trapped targets deal 20% less posture; dazed targets also deal 20% less posture.
talents.requirement: Bear Trap, 55 Medium Weapon, Club equipped

talents.name: Hammerfall
talents.description: Aerial attacks with your club deal 25% more posture damage when blocked.

categories.name: Heat Column
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Heat Column.

talents.name: Fan the Flames
talents.description: Your stored Wind mantras empower your Fire mantras; the effects of Inhale (transferring modifiers) now also affect fire mantras.

categories.name: Heretic
categories.mystic_dialogue: I do not hold the beliefs of the common people.

talents.name: All the Dead Gods
talents.description: Your M1 attacks now apply anti-heal for 8 seconds, reducing most healing on the target based on your total Willpower + Intelligence.
hint: Calculates anti-heal as (INT+WLP)/105.
Does not affect healthpacks.

talents.name: Heretic's Sutra
talents.description: A chant that forces you into Insanity for 20 seconds, instantly losing 15% sanity on use.
hint: If above 80% sanity, you drop down to 65%.
Triggers talents that require sanity loss.
talents.requirement: 80 Willpower, tier 1 insanity, talk to Kasen

categories.name: Human Architecture
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Human Architecture.

talents.name: Brick Wall
talents.description: You refuse to be knocked off your feet until completely unconscious; grants immunity to ragdoll and reduces knockdown and knockback.
hint: Also reduces Perseverance cooldown by ~1 second.
Cap Artist is disabled with this Talent.

talents.name: Not a Scratch
talents.description: Your character shows no visible signs of damage regardless of low HP.
hint: Also disables opponent's ability to gauge your health via spotter effects.

talents.name: Mythic Stability
talents.description: Prevents one instance of instant execution while you're on your feet (60s cooldown).
hint: Does not protect against Blood Scourge or its corrupted variant.

categories.name: Hunter
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Hunter.

talents.name: Peripheral Vision
talents.description: Your glare ignores if your opponent is facing you, increasing your effective awareness.

categories.name: Ice Age
categories.mystic_dialogue: I would see this world freeze.

talents.name: Bottom Freeze
talents.description: Hitting chilled enemies with Ice Projectiles while on ice freezes them to the ground, immobilizing them.
hint: Prevents rotation and overall movement.

talents.name: Cryonis
talents.description: Ice Mantras cost 40% less Ether when cast on ice.

talents.name: Frost Buster
talents.description: Greatsword and Greathammer crits leave a trail of ice and grant the ability to damage boats.
hint: Also works with Greataxes, but not with non-floor-slamming crits.

talents.name: Frostbite
talents.description: Enemies under your chill no longer heal.
hint: Works with Glass Path: Crystallization.

categories.name: Immolator
categories.mystic_dialogue: I burn so that I may succeed.

talents.name: Agitating Spark
talents.description: If you hit an opponent already on fire, the fire spreads to nearby foes (and possibly yourself).
hint: Has a 1s cooldown (occasionally 3s).
Controlled Combustion prevents spreading to allies.

talents.name: Immolation
talents.description: While on fire, your fire spells cost 70% less Ether and, when you hit an enemy, apply fire damage. Self-inflicted damage is reduced by 50%.
hint: Applies burn status instead of additional fire damage.
Works even if using Eruption Path: Lava Serpent.

categories.name: Inferno
categories.mystic_dialogue: All must burn.

talents.name: Corpse Explosion
talents.description: Your flames incinerate unconscious targets faster; bodies that burn to death explode, dealing massive damage.
hint: Explosion does not function separately; it simply burns the target quicker.

talents.name: Pleeksty's Faith
talents.description: When on fire, automatically quench flames at the cost of some Ether.
hint: Does not trigger with flames from Flame Within or Agitating Spark.

talents.name: Pleeksty's Will
talents.description: Gain significantly more Ether from consuming elemental ingredients.
talents.requirement: "Flamecharmer Ploom" Quest in Etris OR 50 Charisma

talents.name: Simmerbloom
talents.description: Your M1 attacks on Pleeksty's Inferno are granted flames.
hint: Equipment Requirements: Power 10, 80 Flamecharm.

categories.name: Innate (Aspect Talents)
categories.mystic_dialogue: I rely on my instincts.

talents.name: Chitin
talents.description: You have a layer of Natural Armor that replenishes when you rest, providing 5% damage reduction.
hint: Durability scales from 215 to 500; stacks with Exoskeleton.
Total durability can reach 800 with bonus.

categories.name: Ironsinger
categories.mystic_dialogue: I obtained the lost art of Ironsinging.

talents.name: Alloyblood
talents.description: Reduces bleed damage by 30% and blood loss by 75%, scaling with investment. Changes your Bloodrend mantras' color.
hint: Stacks multiplicatively with Cauterized Wounds.

talents.name: Ironsinger
talents.description: Grants you the ability to command Metal; press X to pull on metal rods. Your Ironsing mantras apply metal rods on targets.
hint: Default rod limit is 5, and pressing X pulls them from the target.

categories.name: Iron Will
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Iron Will.

talents.name: Willpower Unbounded
talents.description: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your willpower to its fullest.

categories.name: Javelin Lord
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Javelin Lord.

talents.name: Grand Skewer
talents.description: Your Grand Javelin now carries opponents through the air.

categories.name: Jetstriker
categories.mystic_dialogue: Journey before destination.

talents.name: Decisive Winds
talents.description: When damaged below 50% health, gain maximum sprint momentum temporarily, then this ability is put on cooldown.

talents.name: Rush of Ancients
talents.description: Dashing at maximum sprint momentum makes you one with the wind itself.

talents.name: Stratos Step
talents.description: Holding space while climbing will now let you perform Stratos Steps to get even higher.
hint: Consumes Ether per step.
Stratos Steps will only proc twice before going on a cooldown.
Cooldown applies to individual steps.

talents.name: Jetstream Pursuit
talents.description: Upon a successful flourish, teleport to the opponent when they stop moving. Receive a significant boost of momentum. When proccing on humanoid NPCs, sends you to the center of the NPC's hitbox.

talents.name: Acceleration Points
talents.description: Striking an opponent in the back with mobility mantras or basic attacks now steals and grants additional momentum.

categories.name: Justicar
categories.mystic_dialogue: I fight to preserve my way.

talents.name: Jus Karita
talents.description: Gain the ability to use fist combat against weapons, including the ability to block weapons with your hands using Ether. Allows you to use the Jus Karita fist style.
talents.requirement: Achieve a Power level of 5 and a Light Weapons attribute of 40, talk with Polis

talents.name: Justicar's Prowess
talents.description: Jus Karita +30% posture damage against other fist styles.

talents.name: Justicar's Renewal
talents.description: Hitting an opponent with your Jus Karita critical resets the cooldown. Whenever you land the critical of Jus Karita, you can immediately use it again with no delay.

talents.name: Swiftkick Prodigy
talents.description: Hitting successive basic attacks with Jus Karita will give a temporary speed buff. Hitting your opponent with the M1s 3 times will grant you a speed boost.

talents.name: Flying Swiftkick
talents.description: Hitting a Jus Karita critical attack while Swiftkick Prodigy is active will greatly slow your enemy, and consume your speed boost.

categories.name: Kickstarter
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Kickstarter

talents.name: Kickstart
talents.description: Play the resurrector. Use your lightning to defibrillate your allies on the battlefield. Use kickstart on a knocked target to bring them back up in 3 seconds at the cost of some ether. Default knock time is 10 seconds, so you can make your friends get back into the fight over 3 times faster. Takes 5% ether on use and an extra 20% on successive use. Requires an animation, stunlocking yourself.

categories.name: Lancer
categories.mystic_dialogue: I am a master of the spear.

talents.name: Blade's Edge
talents.description: Damage dealt with the tip of the spear is increased by 10%.

talents.name: Defensive Sweep
talents.description: Posture breaking an opponent grants you +50% PEN for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Driving Impact
talents.description: The first hit of your Spear's Critical Attack will deal greatly increased posture damage. Subsequent hits will do reduced posture damage.

talents.name: Lancer's Impale
talents.description: Hitting an enemy after a perfect dodge makes your next attack deal 30% bleed damage; if that attack would already bleed, it adds +10% chip damage instead.

talents.name: Hoplite
talents.description: Posture damage is reduced by 30% when wielding a spear and standing still.
hint: Stacks with shield.

categories.name: Lava Serpent
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the path of the Serpent.

talents.name: Eruption Path: Lava Serpent
talents.description: Your fire abilities no longer proc burn and instead proc an eruption under the enemy's feet. Instead of setting your target on fire, create an eruption on hit. Eruption damage scales with your Flamecharm investment, dealing a maximum of 20 damage at 100 Flamecharm. (3s cooldown). Despite the description, you can still proc burn with Eruption Path.
hint: Burn can still be applied via other talents.

talents.name: Empowered Eruption
talents.description: Your next Eruption after landing a critical is Empowered with +50% range and damage.

talents.name: Flash Point
talents.description: Block breaking an opponent causes your Eruptions to be Empowered for the next 10 seconds. (45s CD). Block breaking an opponent with a Fire Mantra procs Burning.

talents.name: Molten Defence
talents.description: Upon being block broken, you erupt—creating an eruption below your opponent that deals 10 damage with no scaling. This eruption ignores the normal cooldown.

talents.name: The Floor is Lava
talents.description: Your Eruptions leave lethal pools of lava beneath them. Has scaling, but it barely exists.

categories.name: Leader
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Leader.

talents.name: Callout
talents.description: You can mark objects or enemies by pressing Z, which will mark them for all nearby allies.

talents.name: Spotter
talents.description: Marking enemies while in Rhythm will now indicate their health status to your allies. Activated by pressing Z. Disabled on players with Not a Scratch.

categories.name: Leaf in the Wind
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Leaf in the Wind.

talents.name: Observation
talents.description: Dodge frames are larger if you cancel your roll immediately.

talents.name: Safety Dance
talents.description: Your base dodge frames are increased by 0.05s, granting longer invincibility during dodging.

categories.name: Legion Shock Trooper
categories.mystic_dialogue: I fight for the Legion.

talents.name: Cyclone Blade
talents.description: After a successful Gale Dash you wrap your weapon in wind, causing your next Light attack to do +30% damage as bleed and have +10% chip damage.

talents.name: Air Pressure
talents.description: Dodging an attack or hitting an enemy's block will transform your next dash into a Gale Dash.

talents.name: Pressure Break
talents.description: Breaking an enemy's posture will cause them to take intense wind pressure damage and be flung backwards.

talents.name: Wind Step
talents.description: Create a step of wind below you when jumping in the air. Press space while in the air to double jump. In combat, this ability costs Ether to use.

categories.name: Liberator
categories.mystic_dialogue: I will save my people.

talents.name: Savior
talents.description: After saving a player from being gripped, gain a short speed boost.

categories.name: Lichtenberg
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Lichtenberg.

talents.name: Scorched Peak
talents.description: Block breaking an enemy on fire or with a fire mantra causes them to be struck by lightning.

categories.name: Limitbreaker
categories.mystic_dialogue: I go beyond my limits.

talents.name: Comeback Kid
talents.description: When waking up from being knocked, you are unable to be knocked down for 5 seconds. (120 second cooldown)

talents.name: Defiant until the End
talents.description: Slow the enemy trying to execute you down with one last shout of determination.

talents.name: Last Resort
talents.description: Deal +10% more damage when your health is below 25%. Red particles appear around your shoulders while active.

talents.name: The Eleventh Hour
talents.description: When below 15% health your mantras require no Ether to cast for 11 seconds. (60 Second Cooldown)

categories.name: Marauder
categories.mystic_dialogue: I often attack others.

talents.name: Anxious Guard
talents.description: Hitting an enemy's block causes their parry window to be lowered for 5 seconds. (15s cooldown)

talents.name: Old Habits Die Hard
talents.description: Blocking with lingering block frames after a failed parry causes the attack to deal 25% less posture damage.

talents.name: Thresher Claws
talents.description: All of your attacks have +5% more PEN; your M1s and critical attacks have an additional +5% PEN on top.

talents.name: Thresher Scales
talents.description: You regenerate your armor at campfires.

categories.name: Master Survivalists
categories.mystic_dialogue: I am nature's master.

talents.name: Survival Kit
talents.description: You keep a well-stocked set of tools on your person at all times. Your flint never runs out of uses.
hint: Obtainment: Wipe with Herbivore, Iron Gut and Termite.

categories.name: Meditative Trance
categories.mystic_dialogue: I am often in my own world.

talents.name: Impervious Slumber
talents.description: Getting hit while knocked no longer resets your time knocked.

talents.name: Warrior's Respite
talents.description: Stop moving for 15 seconds to initiate healing. Any movement or action cancels the effect.
hint: Does not activate on moving ships.
Activates in water with spawn immunity.

categories.name: Mental Fortress
categories.mystic_dialogue: My mind is indomitable.

talents.name: Breathing Exercise
talents.description: Your sanity recovers more quickly once out of terrifying situations.

talents.name: Conquer your Fears
talents.description: Killing the beings of the deep replenishes your sanity; when an ally grips an enemy nearby, you regain Sanity.

talents.name: Disbelief
talents.description: You're resistant to Illusion magic; reduces duration of Charmed effects and Illusionary Servant casts.

categories.name: Merchant
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Merchant.

talents.name: Art of the Deal
talents.description: Your rapport with merchants gives you lower prices.

categories.name: Metallurgist
categories.mystic_dialogue: Metal itself is my shield, whichever form it may take.

talents.name: Intuitive Repairs
talents.description: Your 'Iron Skin' repairs armor while it's active, and repairs natural armor from Chitin and Exoskeleton.

talents.name: Metal Absorption
talents.description: Your 'Iron Hug' also absorbs armor from the enemy.

talents.name: Metal Eater
talents.description: When you have no Ether, consume Armor durability to cast your Ironsing mantras.

talents.name: Metal Thief
talents.description: Pulling an opponent absorbs a portion of their current Armor durability.

talents.name: Polished Armor
talents.description: You receive 5% less damage when your Armor protects you and has over 90% durability; scales up to 10% at 100 MTL.

categories.name: Metamancer
categories.mystic_dialogue: I want to WIN.

talents.name: Chain of Perfection
talents.description: Gain stacks of 'Perfection' on hitting mobs with close-range attacks; all stacks are lost on taking damage.
hint: Can stack up to 20 times for a 100% damage boost.
Delay before full application after unlock.

talents.name: Lootskipper
talents.description: Mobs have a much higher chance to drop their rarest loot when slain.
hint: Increases odds of the item with the lowest rate appearing.
Applies to mob drops, not chest spawns.

categories.name: Ministry Prophet
categories.mystic_dialogue: I wish to see this world drown.

talents.name: Already Dead
talents.description: You take reduced damage from abilities with a health cost. Lowers self-damage from various sources.
hint: Obtained from: Deepscorn Casque

talents.name: Withering Soul
talents.description: Your M1's proc 12.5% of their damage as Wither; wielding the Deepspindle doubles it.
hint: Based on weapon's scaled damage.
Obtained from: Darkened Bastion

categories.name: Mindbreaker
categories.mystic_dialogue: I dominate the minds of others.

talents.name: Lose Your Mind
talents.description: Deal more damage the more insane you are. The damage buff starts at 70% Sanity and scales non-linearly until it caps at +15% with 0% Sanity.

talents.name: Piercing Will
talents.description: When your sanity is below 35%, gain up to +15% PEN on your attacks, scaling from 5% upward.

talents.name: Shared Misery
talents.description: Using a M1/Critical Attack on an enemy while losing sanity causes them to lose sanity as well.

categories.name: Mr Charm
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Mr Charm.

talents.name: Charisma Unbounded
talents.description: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your charisma to its fullest.

categories.name: Murmur
categories.mystic_dialogue: My soul is an instrument with its own frequency.

talents.name: Ardour Scream
talents.description: Amplify your shout into a scream that causes victims to take 25% more damage and 50% more posture damage for 10 seconds.
hint: Takes 100% Ether to use; can be used at 40% Ether with Soulbreaker Oath.
Does not apply insanity; stacks with multiple attack types.

talents.name: Murmur: Ardour
talents.description: An application of your Soul Murmur that channels it into raw strength.
hint: Press H to activate.
Will drain Ether under power 20; deactivates at 0% Ether or upon use.
talents.requirement: Kill the Dread Serpent, The Doom Of Caeranthil, or talk with the Old Stranger

talents.name: Murmur: Rhythm
talents.description: An application of your Soul Murmur that lets you perceive the subtle murmur of all things.
hint: Press G while crouched to activate.
Pings nearby monsters, NPCs, and players with color-coded health indications.
talents.requirement: Complete the Quest in the Second Layer

talents.name: Murmur: Tacet
talents.description: An application of your Soul Murmur that suppresses your own murmur.
hint: Press T while crouched to activate.
talents.requirement: 10 Charisma and 5 Cestis Bounties or 5 Bounty Hunting Contracts

categories.name: Natural Armor
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Natural Armor.

talents.name: Armor Conserver
talents.description: You lose 15% less armor when hit.

talents.name: Lightweight
talents.description: Move faster when your armor runs out of durability.
hint: When Armor is at 0% or wearing the Stranded outfit, movement speed increases by 25% (mobility buff, not a speed boost).

talents.name: Padded Armor
talents.description: While your armor is broken (or if you have no armor), you take 5% less damage.

talents.name: Steel Scales
talents.description: You take an additional 5% less damage when your armor is broken.

categories.name: Navaen Nomad
categories.mystic_dialogue: I am one with Navae.

talents.name: Captain Etrea
talents.description: [Fists] Moving while blocking with a shield no longer slows you down.
talents.requirement: Trained Fist, Moving Fortress, Shield Equipped, 20 Fortitude and 30 Strength

talents.name: Fists of Fortitude
talents.description: Every 6 light attacks with fist builds up a shield of endurance (Ether Shield) reducing incoming damage by 15%.

talents.name: Way of Navae
talents.description: Gain the ability to use fist combat against weapons. Includes the ability to block with your hands using Ether.
talents.requirement: Bring a Navaen Nomad Captive to Eastern Camp Master on Etris, or Eastern Tribal Leader on Summer Isle

categories.name: Needle
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Needle.

talents.name: Duelist's Lunge
talents.description: [Rapier] Running M1's deal increased posture damage. Upon landing your Critical, your next running M1 will have increased range.

talents.name: Frenzied Dance
talents.description: [Rapier] When your posture is about to collapse, you deal greater chip and posture damage.

talents.name: Pressure Skewer
talents.description: [Rapier] Flourishing an enemy causes your M1's to deal additional blood loss until you take damage, also granting +25% chip damage.

categories.name: Nimble Blade
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Nimble Blade.

talents.name: Fast Blade
talents.description: Extend the speed boost you get from successfully parrying an attack.

talents.name: Lightspeed Reflexes
talents.description: Feinting gives a very brief auto-parry window.

talents.name: Speed Emission
talents.description: Gain a slight speed boost after landing a vent.

categories.name: Omniscient
categories.mystic_dialogue: I am all knowing.

talents.name: Intelligence Unbounded
talents.description: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your Intelligence to its fullest.

talents.name: All Knowing
talents.description: Your prediction now ignores the range requirement to reflect attacks.

talents.name: Successive Prediction
talents.description: Predicting an attack will briefly allow you to predict another, reflecting multi-hit moves.

talents.name: Twelve Steps Ahead
talents.description: Landing Prediction will halve the cooldown to a minimum of 2s while whiffing doubles it to a maximum of 30s. This effect stacks for up to 30 seconds.

categories.name: One Eyed King
categories.mystic_dialogue: I see what I desire to.

talents.name: Strength Unbounded
talents.description: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your Strength to its fullest.

categories.name: Outlaw
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Outlaw.

talents.name: Lock n Load
talents.description: [1H Guns] The first bullet in your gun does more damage when fully loaded. This damage buff scales with the number of bullets up to 15%.

talents.name: Rapid Fire
talents.description: [1H Guns] When you land a critical shot gain an ability to rapidly fire your critical for 2s. 12s Cooldown.
hint: Procs on dodge, block and getting hit.

talents.name: Rapid Reload
talents.description: [1H Guns] You have 20% faster reload when reloading an empty pistol.
hint: It takes 0.4 seconds to reload each bullet of an empty gun instead of 0.5 seconds.

talents.name: Sleight of Hands
talents.description: [1H Guns] When you flourish an opponent you instantly load a bullet.

talents.name: Ultrakill
talents.description: [1H Guns] When under the effects of Rapid Fire you reload 2X as fast.
talents.requirement: Rapid Fire, 55 Light Weapon, using a Gun

categories.name: Politician
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of politician.

talents.name: Cult of Personality
talents.description: You gain +3% PEN for each person Charmed, capping at +15% PEN.

talents.name: Pardon Me
talents.description: Crimes you commit in allied territories are often ignored. Who's asking?
hint: Guards from faction which you are at or above neutral reputation will not aggro on you.
Crimes still induce reputation loss; they will turn hostile/react once your reputation becomes negative.

categories.name: Prospector
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Prospector.

talents.name: Harvester
talents.description: Chance to receive two sets of ingredients when harvesting.

talents.name: Excavator
talents.description: Chance to receive two sets of ore when mining, mine ores a lot faster.
talents.requirement: Turn in 5 pure ores at a Blacksmith.

categories.name: Public Figure
categories.mystic_dialogue: I am for the people.

talents.name: Celebrity
talents.description: Your natural skill in mediating conflict makes people think more highly of you. Your base reputation with factions is higher and your reputation caps out higher.
hint: This Talent was merged with the old "Diplomat" Talent.

talents.name: Under The Radar
talents.description: The negative reputation threshold for a faction to put out posters of you is now higher. (+1 health)
hint: If stacked with "Celebrity" Talent, you can avoid being hunted by Voidwalkers until your reputation drops even lower.

categories.name: Pyroclast
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Pyroclast.

talents.name: Volcanic Glass
talents.rarity_type: Advanced Talent, Flamecharm & Frostdraw Exclusive, Dual Attunement
talents.description: Detonating crystals causes an eruption soon after.
talents.requirement: Eruption Path: Lava Serpent, Glass Path: Crystallization

categories.name: Pyromancer
categories.mystic_dialogue: I am a master of the flame.

talents.name: Hungry Flames
talents.description: When you have no Ether, consume Stomach and Water to instantly cast your next fire mantra.

categories.name: Quack Doctor
categories.mystic_dialogue: My cure is most effective.

talents.name: Blood Bag
talents.description: You receive extra blood from knocking an enemy.

talents.name: Blood Transfusion
talents.description: Successfully landing a critical attack while under a negative status effect will transfer the effect plus recover a small portion of your blood bar. (20 second CD)

talents.name: Just a Taste
talents.description: First Bloodrend mantra you hit in combat has increased blood drain.

talents.name: Open Wound
talents.description: Guardbreaking enemies leaves them more susceptible to blood loss from Bloodrend mantras.

categories.name: Raging Bull
categories.mystic_dialogue: My attack is unstoppable.

talents.name: Bulldozer
talents.description: Enemies you flourish into a wall have a chance of breaking the wall and are guard broken on impact.
hint: Mutual Exclusives: Dazing Finisher

talents.name: Broken Ankles
talents.description: Blockbreaking an opponent puts their Mobility slot Mantras on cooldown for 12s. 30s CD.

talents.name: Piercing Blow
talents.description: Attacks that break an opponent's block ignore their Armor resistances.

categories.name: Rampaging Brute
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Rampaging Brute.

talents.name: Shield Breaker
talents.description: Blunt damage now fully ignores the posture bonus from shields.
hint: Bypass the increased posture from your enemy’s shield. Effectively strips them of shield benefits.

talents.name: Unwavering Resolve
talents.description: Getting parried punishes your posture 33% less.

talents.name: Million Ton Piercer
talents.description: Gain 5% extra PEN and remove the cap on your PEN. Go beyond your limits.
hint: Like Ether Overdrive, removes 50% mantra and physical PEN cap.
Mutual Exclusive: Ether Overdrive

categories.name: Rampant Static
categories.mystic_dialogue: My static is uncontrollable.

talents.name: Jolting Current
talents.description: Your lightning attacks in water strike others near them with lightning.

categories.name: Rending Needle
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Rending Needle.

talents.name: Conductor's Cable
talents.description: Applying Conductor rods on opponents steals some of their armor to you.
hint: Steals 10% armor on proc

talents.name: Rending Needle: Impaler
talents.description: If an enemy is affected by 5 or more metal rods, your Ironsing Pull instead pulls out all of the rods for massive damage.
hint: Increases the amount of iron rods you can apply from 5 to 10.
Scaling: 4 + Ironsing*0.02
Deals 5.5 physical damage per rod when meeting requirements.
Not affected by "Return To The Dark Ages" Talent
Best PVE path due to armor drain and damage to mobs unlike other paths.
Has 6.5x PVE scale (5.5 DMG PVP to 35.60 PVE DMG)
Mutual Exclusives: Rending Needle: Conductor, Rending Needle: Jailer

talents.name: Rending Needle: Conductor
talents.description: 5 metal rods will combine into a conductor rod. If an enemy uses a non-Ironsing elemental mantra, they're dealt with their element back in return.
hint: Works as default path with exception of applying a Conductor rod after 5 normal metal rods are applied.
Conductor rods last 30 seconds or until an elemental mantra is used.
On proc, the Conductor Rod will apply the elemental effect of the Mantra your opponent is trying to use to themselves.
If your opponent uses a Mantra while affected by a Conductor rod, 5% of their armor will be drained and it procs an effect based on the attunement used.
You can't pull out Conductor rods, nor can they be consumed with Scrapsinger.
Conductor's rod on proc does not apply rod/pull immunity.
Mutual Exclusives: Rending Needle: Impaler, Rending Needle: Jailer

talents.name: Rending Needle: Jailer
talents.description: If an enemy has 5 or more rods, your Ironsing Pull will restrain them instead of pulling them.
hint: Increases the amount of iron rods you can apply from 5 to 10.
Once restrained, the target is unable to react in any way (though Venting is enabled).
Enemies have damage reduced by 30% when Metal Jailed.
Restrain lasts ~1.08s with 5 rods, ~1.6s with 10 rods.
6 second rod/pull immunity upon release, then 1s afterwards.
Mutual Exclusives: Rending Needle: Impaler, Rending Needle: Conductor

categories.name: Saboteur
categories.mystic_dialogue: I sabotage others.

talents.name: Family Recipe
talents.description: You can now craft bombs at a crafting bench.

talents.name: Incendiary Formula
talents.description: Bombs will set your enemies on fire upon detonation, as well as launch with more force. Bombs will deal increased damage to burning enemies.

talents.name: Explosive Efficiency
talents.description: Crafting a bomb will yield two bombs. Chance to make three.

talents.name: Sulphur Surprise
talents.description: Your cooldown for throwing bombs will be shortened after your first bomb damages an enemy.

talents.name: Hot Potato
talents.description: Gain a large boost of speed after throwing a bomb. Your bombs have a chance to detonate twice.

talents.name: Pocket Bombs
talents.description: You have a chance to activate a bomb in your inventory when damaged.
hint: Drops two bombs from one bomb.

categories.name: Sage of Wisps
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek to command the elements as my servant.

talents.name: Will o' Wisp
talents.description: Your mastery over the Wisps of the Song enables you to mediate the innate conflicts between your wisps, allowing any number of Wisps to be active at a time.
hint: Allows the player to summon one of each Wisp at the same time.

categories.name: Saint of Blades
categories.mystic_dialogue: With the blade, I am chosen.

talents.name: Light Weapons Unbounded
talents.description: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your Light Weapons attribute to its fullest.

talents.name: Medium Weapons Unbounded
talents.description: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your Medium Weapons attribute to its fullest.

talents.name: Heavy Weapons Unbounded
talents.description: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your Heavy Weapons attribute to its fullest.

categories.name: Sapper
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Sapper.

talents.name: Dark Receiver
talents.description: Shadow moves will also steal Ether from those you are Static Linked tethered to.
hint: ~2-3% increase in ether steal per mantra.

categories.name: Scarlet Donor
categories.mystic_dialogue: I wish to share my blood with the world.

talents.name: Blood Bank
talents.description: Consuming 'Charm' now gives slight temporary health.

talents.name: Donation Drive
talents.description: Consuming 'Charm' on an opponent replenishes some blood. Additionally, you can activate this effect (and Manipulator) via blockbreaking with a Bloodrend mantra.

talents.name: Sharing is Caring
talents.description: Your 'Charm' on opponents also slightly increases your blood drain against them.

categories.name: Scholar of the Cloud
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Scholar of the Cloud.

talents.name: Windwaker
talents.description: Call upon a gust of wind to propel your boat even faster.
hint: Unintuitive to most; using Windwaker grants a further speed boost only inside a Wind Gate.
talents.requirement: Sail with your mast pointed towards the wind in a sea highway for an unknown amount of time, 20 Galebreathe

categories.name: Scoundrel
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Scoundrel.

talents.name: Dirty Boxing
talents.description: Enemies hit after you feint them with your fist suffer slight bleed and have their vision obscured slightly. 5s Cooldown.
hint: The 'bleed' does not refer to standard Bleed Damage; it's extremely minor.
Cooldown is actually ~8 seconds (description says 5s).
Works with Jus Karita.

talents.name: Pocket Sand
talents.description: [Fist] Feinting into an uppercut blinds and dazes your opponent briefly. 30s cooldown.
hint: Does not work with Jus Karita.

categories.name: Scrapsinger
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of the Scrapsinger.

talents.name: Gilded Path: Scrapsinger
talents.description: Flourishing an enemy consumes any rods they have and siphons their armor to you per rod.

talents.name: Refine and Reuse
talents.description: Consuming rods with Scrapsinger reduces incoming PEN against you for 14 seconds.
hint: Each rod reduces PEN by 5% multiplicatively.
Doesn't work well with Reinforced Armor.

talents.name: Artisan's Blade
talents.description: Activating Scrapsinger forges a metal blade behind you for every 2 rods consumed. The blades fire at a target upon landing an ironsing or metal-infused attack.
hint: Deals 11.5 Ironsing damage per blade at 80 Ironsing.
Has 6.47x PVE scale.
Windup of 1.2s and auto-parry on being parried.

talents.name: Songs Unforged
talents.description: Your weapon criticals now activate Scrapsinger.

talents.name: Masterwork
talents.description: Successful hits from Artisan's Blades will proc metal rods and deal 50% more damage.
hint: Increases Artisan's Blades damage from 11.5 to 16.7, and applies 1 rod per hit.

talents.name: Reshape and Remold
talents.description: Successful procs of Scrapsinger increase the armor damage your opponent takes. After 10 stacks, the opponent takes +5% damage until stacks drop.
hint: Extra 5% armor drain on flourish/crit.
5% DMG bonus currently bugged.
Additional VFX when proc'd.

categories.name: Seeker of Sound
categories.mystic_dialogue: I search for the Song.

talents.name: Dragon's Song
talents.description: Using a mantra after an uppercut grants ether.
hint: 2s Cooldown.
Grants +20 ether on proc.

categories.name: Self-Shocker
categories.mystic_dialogue: I am a self-starter.

talents.name: Jumpstart
talents.description: Using Static Withdraw when not being carried applies Jumpstart, increasing your ability to scale walls, your speed, and applying shock to all outgoing physical damage and damage taken. Grants a +10% damage multiplier.

talents.name: Raging Static
talents.description: Your Jumpstart no longer gives you movement buffs, but your Jumpstart physical damage is increased up to +20%. The self damage to activate it is lowered. Your cooldown on Jumpstart is also lowered.

categories.name: Septicemia
categories.mystic_dialogue: I have sewn an insidious poison within my enemy's blood.

talents.name: Gruesome Harvest
talents.description: Landing Bloodrend mantras on opponents with over 70% blood poison will give you slight temporary health.

talents.name: Hemolysis
talents.description: Deal 20% more critical attack damage to opponents with over 25% blood poisoning.

talents.name: Hemolytic Transfusion
talents.description: Guardbreaking an enemy with a Bloodrend mantra increases the amount of blood poison from the attack.

talents.name: Juicy Snack
talents.description: Eliminating enemies returns their amount of blood poison as health to you.

talents.name: Panacea
talents.description: Hitting an enemy with a Bloodrend mantra stops their blood poison from decaying briefly.

talents.name: Tainted Ground
talents.description: Enemies who stand in blood pools will not decay blood poison.

talents.name: Vasculitis
talents.description: Your opponent cannot proc deep gems if they have over 20% blood poisoning for a brief duration (must hit them while they are over 20% BP).

categories.name: Shadowcast Master
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Shadowcast Master.

talents.name: Shadowcast Unbounded
talents.description: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your Shadowcast to its fullest.

categories.name: Shadowcaster
categories.mystic_dialogue: I speak to the shadows.

talents.name: Adept Shadowcaster
talents.description: You can now obtain 1-star Leveled Shadowcaster Mantras.

talents.name: Blossoming Darkness
talents.description: The more Ether you drain during Shadow Roar, the bigger it gets.

talents.name: Expert Shadowcaster
talents.description: You can now obtain 2-star Leveled Shadowcaster Mantras.

categories.name: Sightless Still
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Sightless Still.

talents.name: Sightless Still
talents.description: The more a person is affected by your shadowcast, the more you obscure their vision.
hint: Block breaking an opponent obscures their vision with darkness more potent than your Shadow mantras.

categories.name: Singularity
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Singularity.

talents.name: Singularity
talents.description: Enemies will briefly hang in place when hit by a shadow move.
hint: Mutual Exclusive with Sightless Still.

categories.name: Shieldmaster
categories.mystic_dialogue: My shield is my ally.

talents.name: Knight's Rally
talents.description: When using a shield, you ready your block more quickly after taking a hit.
hint: Reduces time in weak block when holding a shield.

talents.name: Turtle Shell
talents.description: If your shield is on your back, you take reduced backstab damage and negate Spine Cutter.
hint: 25% damage reduction from the back.
Visual effect: white square particles.

categories.name: Shipwright
categories.mystic_dialogue: I repair ships.

talents.name: Emergency Repairs
talents.description: Your repairs are twice as efficient when the ship is on low health.
hint: Restores 25% more HP to the boat when below 25% HP.
Scaled with the ship's max health.
talents.requirement: Automatically gained after using the Repair Hammer 11 times; Brigand's Bicorn required

talents.name: Spare Nails
talents.description: Your repairs are more efficient and you no longer drop Wood on death.
hint: Restores 400 HP instead of 250 HP.
talents.requirement: Automatically gained after using the Repair Hammer 51 times; Brigand's Bicorn required

categories.name: Silencer
categories.mystic_dialogue: The song shall be silenced.

talents.name: Silencer's Blade
talents.description: Melee an enemy affected by Suffocation to extend its duration and grant a speed boost.
hint: Landing M1 attacks on suffocated targets applies an extra stack.

categories.name: A World Without Song
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek a world without song.

talents.name: A World Without Song
talents.description: Every 3 hits with a Wind Mantra now procs Suffocate, preventing mantra casting and dealing damage over time.
hint: If used with Haunted Path: Specter, every 3 hits will also spawn an Apparition (Winded).

categories.name: Silvertongue
categories.mystic_dialogue: I get my way.

talents.name: Friends in High Places
talents.description: Your connections often let you off the hook when in trouble with the law.
hint: Town guards will scold you instead of gripping you if you have good reputation.

talents.name: Golden Tongue
talents.description: Typing gives a random buff to you and those around you.
hint: Buff can either restore 30% max Ether or grant 10% damage reduction for 30 seconds.

categories.name: Snake Oil
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Snake Oil.

talents.name: Snake Oil
talents.description: You charge criminally high prices for your items, gaining 40% more notes from sales.

categories.name: Showboater
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Showboater.

talents.name: Unnecessary Theatrics
talents.description: Deliver a one-liner on uppercuts, flourishes, and critical attacks that briefly charms your opponents.
hint: The cooldown indicator says 10s (though there's no actual CD for charm).
Lasts around 6 seconds on flourish, uppercut, and criticals.
Does not proc Golden Tongue.
