categories.name: Soul Converter
categories.mystic_dialogue: I convert blood to iron.

talents.name: Bloodiron Spirit
talents.description: You regain some Armor upon killing enemies; any kill gives you 2.5% of your total armor durability.
hint: Stacks with Bloodiron Ring, totalling up to 5% armor per kill.

categories.name: Soverign of Slaughter
categories.mystic_dialogue: I destroy my enemies.

talents.name: Chime of Conflict
talents.description: Drift in and out of reality, challenging foes and granting access to the PvP Arena.

categories.name: Specter
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Specter.

talents.name: Haunted Path: Specter
talents.description: Build up spectral energy by dodging successfully and landing Wind Mantras; phantom winds no longer appear.
hint: Perfect casting of Galebreathe mantras still causes phantom winds.

talents.name: Apparitions
talents.description: Instead of Haunted Gale Phantoms and Suffocation, each proc now sends apparitions toward your enemy, applying 'Winded'.
hint: Apparitions cannot be parried if you are in 'Phantom Step'.

talents.name: Phantom Step
talents.description: Press X to dash at high speeds as your regular dashes transform into gale dashes (requires at least 10% Spectral Gauge).

talents.name: Vanishing Wraith
talents.description: Your aerial attacks while in Phantom Step will now teleport you behind your target.

talents.name: Possession
talents.description: After an apparition hits an enemy, receive 30% posture damage on all Galebreathe attacks for 6 seconds. If the apparition hits while Phantom Step is active, also gain a 15% chip damage buff.
hint: Activates from Inhaled M1s and Crits; works with specific weapons.

talents.name: Heartwing Beat
talents.description: Your aerial attack is replaced with a hyperarmor attack that applies wither and innate bleed.
hint: This talent has a 6-second cooldown.
Granted by the Mantle of Enmity torso equipment.

categories.name: Static Weaver
categories.mystic_dialogue: I weave webs of lightning.

talents.name: Static Link
talents.description: Flourishing or uppercutting an enemy creates a static link between you and them; your lightning stuns enemies for 1.5x as long.
hint: This talent is bugged and currently doesn't apply the longer stun.

talents.name: Jumper Cables
talents.description: When knocked with an active tether, steal HP from the target to avoid being knocked.
hint: 3–4 seconds cooldown between knock preventions.

talents.name: Link Conduction
talents.description: While you have active tethers, your lightning mantras cost 30% less Ether per active link.

talents.name: Static Ace
talents.description: Using Lightning Stream with an active tether targets your closest active tether, instantly grabbing the target.
hint: Actually targets the first active tether, not the closest.

talents.name: Static Allure
talents.description: Having two active tethers causes the previous tethered enemy to magnetize to the newest one and increases tether duration by 15 seconds.

categories.name: Stormcaller
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Stormcaller.

talents.name: Storm Link
talents.description: While you have a Static Link on an enemy, your Wind mantras that hit them are imbued with flashes of Lightning.
hint: Converts Galebreathe elemental damage to Thundercall elemental damage and adds +10% damage.
Does not proc any additional Talents, status effects, or stun.

categories.name: Sturdy Resolve
categories.mystic_dialogue: My will stands strong.

talents.name: Grasp on Reality
talents.description: Reduces damage taken from insanity (Tier 2, Scratching).

talents.name: Magical Resolve
talents.description: Being hit increases Ether regeneration for a short duration.

talents.name: Unfazed
talents.description: You are more resilient to insanity effects; you no longer Shiver and Panic with reduced severity.
hint: Shivering is delayed to Tier 2 and scratching to Tier 3.

categories.name: Super Conductor
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Superconductor.

talents.name: Voltaic Conductor
talents.description: Your Thundercall mantras deal 20% chip damage against enemies with conductor rods.
hint: Doesn't work on Iron Tether due to penetration through guard.

categories.name: Survival Instinct
categories.mystic_dialogue: I will not fall to the elements.

categories.name: Herbivore
categories.mystic_dialogue: You gain more nutrition from eating plants.

talents.name: Herbivore
talents.description: Gain more nutrition from eating plants.

categories.name: Iron Gut
categories.mystic_dialogue: I have resistance against being poisoned by foods.

talents.name: Iron Gut
talents.description: Provides resistance against food poisoning.

categories.name: Termite
categories.mystic_dialogue: I can eat things most would consider inedible.

talents.name: Termite
talents.description: You can eat inedible items, gaining (+3 Health).
hint: Unlock requirement: Wipe with the Iron Gut Talent.

categories.name: Survivor
categories.mystic_dialogue: In nature, I am at home.

categories.name: Winter's Protection
categories.mystic_dialogue: Your tightly-bound winter gear negates elemental damage buffs from weather.

talents.name: Winter's Protection
talents.description: Negates weather damage buffs and increases parasite resistance.
hint: Obtained by equipping Winter Corps Parka.

categories.name: Swiftshade
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Swiftshade.

categories.name: Dustlunge
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Dustlunge.

talents.name: Dustlunge
talents.description: You can assassinate enemies from farther away by shadestepping to them. Assassination automatically affects nearby enemies.
hint: Assassination range is greatly extended; teleportation occurs outside standard range.
Also allows assassinating players in combat.

categories.name: None Left Behind
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of None Left Behind.

talents.name: None Left Behind
talents.description: You can shadestep to pick up knocked humanoids far away from you.
hint: Pressing V on a knocked entity teleports you to them; can go through walls if aimed correctly.

categories.name: Tactician
categories.mystic_dialogue: I think before I fight.

talents.name: Hard Read
talents.description: Hitting your opponent during a feint causes them to be dazed.

talents.name: Punishing Blow
talents.description: Swinging with a heavy weapon dazes opponents on impact.

talents.name: Target Switch
talents.description: After parrying an opponent, hitting another makes your next mantra free.
hint: Signalled by a yellow halo; proc works even on knocked enemies.

talents.name: Foolish Outburst
talents.description: Blocking or parrying a vent absorbs its Tempo cost.
hint: Works with the Veteran Adventurer Outfit.

talents.name: Water off a Duck's Back
talents.description: Venting shifts all elemental status effects onto enemies hit by your vent.

categories.name: Tamed Flame
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Tamed Flame.

talents.name: Controlled Combustion
talents.description: Your Agitating Spark no longer spreads to your allies.
hint: Prevents self-spread as well; note the talent may behave erratically in tight spaces.

categories.name: Tavernkeep
categories.mystic_dialogue: I enjoy a good meal.

talents.name: Artisan Chef
talents.description: Food you cook becomes Artisan food, increasing its hunger and thirst benefits by 25%.
hint: Confirmed prerequisites: 25 Intelligence, 15 Charisma, Cooked 50 Dishes.

talents.name: Master Chef
talents.description: Buffs from food you cook are amplified by 30%.
hint: Confirmed prerequisites: 25 Intelligence, 15 Charisma, Cooked 50 Dishes.

talents.name: Umami
talents.description: Feast on foes with mighty cutlery; Chef Weapons now steal opponents' hunger.
hint: Acts similarly to Gluttony enchant, but only removes hunger.

categories.name: The Demon Blade
categories.mystic_dialogue: My unholy blade works for no man.

talents.name: Explosive Finish
talents.description: If an enemy is on fire when you flourish, blast them away with a fire blast.
hint: Upon proccing Emperor Flame, this talent goes on a 3s cooldown.

talents.name: Flaming Flourish
talents.description: Set enemies on fire when you flourish or uppercut them. Also applies burn on nearby enemies.

categories.name: The Emperor's Blade
categories.mystic_dialogue: My blade burns through my foes.

talents.name: Emperor Flame
talents.description: Absorb fire produced by you; once you reach 5 stacks, your next attack automatically triggers Explosive Finish.
hint: Lasts ~11s with a 30s cooldown.
Does not proc if on cooldown; can gain stacks from Flame Within.

talents.name: Mirage Clone
talents.description: Successfully dodging creates a heat mirage clone that sets enemies on fire.
hint: 20s cooldown; with eruption path, it procs eruption.

categories.name: The Negotiator
categories.mystic_dialogue: I can talk myself out of any situation.

talents.name: Last Second Negotiation
talents.description: When you are gripped, your character shouts to cancel the grip, slightly slowing the enemy's attempt.
hint: Does not work in PvE.

categories.name: Thief
categories.mystic_dialogue: I steal from others.

talents.name: Cap Artist
talents.description: Pressing R while crouching allows you to fake being dead; your eyes remain open, and no loot bag is dropped.
hint: Cancelled by pressing R again.
Disabled with Brick Wall.

talents.name: Master Thief
talents.description: Gain more notes when mugging a player.

talents.name: Pickpocket
talents.description: Gain the ability to pickpocket by pressing N.
hint: Target must be knocked for pickpocketing.

talents.name: Another Man's Trash
talents.description: Take unequipped equipment when mugging a player.
hint: Cap Artist requires 25 Agility despite its own lower requirement.
Does not take enchanted items.

categories.name: Thunder Brawler
categories.mystic_dialogue: My fists are imbued with lightning.

talents.name: Discharge
talents.description: On the 5th successful attack, discharge static to deal lightning damage to nearby foes.
hint: Scales with Thundercall investment (~5 base damage, +0.025 per point).
Effect lasts for 30 seconds.

categories.name: Thunder Caster
categories.mystic_dialogue: I electrocute my foes from afar.

talents.name: Jolt Cast
talents.description: Every perfect casted Thundercall Mantra builds a stack; at 3 stacks, your next Lightning Mantra casts faster.

talents.name: Rain of Static
talents.description: After casting Lightning Impact, strike down multiple projectiles; subsequent casts require more time.
hint: Hover above ground during Lightning Impact.

categories.name: Thunderblade
categories.mystic_dialogue: My blade conducts the skies wrath.

talents.name: Gathering Electricity
talents.description: Reaching 5 Static Blade charges will now consume the stacks and apply a lightning buff to your blade. 60 second cooldown. (+10 Carry Load)
talents.requirement: 65 Thundercall, 25 Strength / 25 Agility, Static Blade, Any Medium Weapon (Cannot obtain with Rifle)

talents.name: Overcharge
talents.description: Your next dash after activating Static Blade is enhanced by lightning.

talents.name: Static Blade
talents.description: Hitting blocks, blocking, or parrying hits will now generate an electric charge in your blade, granting a small speed buff. Charges can stack up to 5 times.
hint: Works with Hero Blades

categories.name: Thundercaller
categories.mystic_dialogue: I speak to lightning.

talents.name: Adept Thundercaller
talents.description: You can now obtain 1-star Thundercaller mantras.

talents.name: Discovery Of Fire
talents.description: Flints and Flamecharm are for simpletons. Grants the tool 'Discovery of Fire', which uses Ether to light up all nearby campfires. Using this ability will also light nearby downed enemies aflame. Can be parried.

talents.name: Expert Thundercaller
talents.description: You can now obtain 2-star Thundercaller mantras.

talents.name: Master Thundercaller
talents.description: You can now obtain 3-star Thundercaller mantras.

talents.name: Shocking Finish
talents.description: Following a flourish up with a lightning beam causes it to be cast instantly. Does not work on monsters.

talents.name: Static Fakeout
talents.description: Roll cancelling immediately after a parry will cause you to teleport behind your opponent.

talents.name: Static Flash Clone
talents.description: When using Lightning Clones, you instead disappear, leaving behind a static clone for a short duration.

talents.name: Static Withdraw
talents.description: If you get knocked for the first time, and someone tries to carry you, you can discharge and damage them (goes on cooldown after use). Bodies of knocked enemies become charged with electricity, stunning people who attempt to carry them. Very tight activation window + delayed activation. If you successfully shock the moment someone tries to carry you, you immediately get back up and trigger related Talents.

talents.name: Stratoshock
talents.description: Your lightning deals an additional +5% damage when in the rain.

talents.name: Thundercaller
talents.description: Grants you the ability to command Lightning as a Thundercaller.
talents.requirement: Thundercall at Power 1 (1 Thundercall) or via Thundercall trainer (Funke)

categories.name: Toxic Personality
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Toxic Personality.

talents.name: Manipulator
talents.description: Deal 20% more critical attack damage to charmed enemies, but the effect is removed on impact. Works well with 'Unnecessary Theatrics' as it reapplies the charm. 10s cooldown.

talents.name: Narcissist
talents.description: Charming an already Charmed opponent Overcharms you briefly for 4 seconds. Mutually exclusive with Tough Love.

categories.name: Transitory Vitality
categories.mystic_dialogue: I use my blood's plasma to better defend myself.

talents.name: Sow and Mend
talents.description: Sacrifice 17.5% of your blood for temporary health. (15s cooldown) Grants ~8% temporary health.

talents.name: Cyclical Exsanguination
talents.description: Whenever you deal more than 20 damage in one instance, pause your temporary health decay for 3 seconds.

talents.name: Embolism
talents.description: If an enemy is guardbroken while you have temporary health, convert that temporary health into additional damage.

talents.name: Hypovolemic Focus
talents.description: While you have temporary health, your opponent regains far less posture from parrying you.

categories.name: Trickster
categories.mystic_dialogue: I often like to play pranks on others.

talents.name: Cheap Shot
talents.description: Your attacks gain 10% PEN multiplicatively when you have an active speed boost. This can bypass the 50% PEN cap. (+6 Passive Agility)

talents.name: Down Comes the Claw
talents.description: Landing a Critical while you have a speed boost prevents your opponent from being able to dodge twice in a row for 5s. (5s cooldown per target) (+1 Passive Agility)

talents.name: Pursuit
talents.description: If you land your Revenge, clear its cooldown immediately. (25s cooldown) (+1 Passive Agility). Procs even if blocked or parried.

talents.name: Crippling Comeuppance
talents.description: Landing Revenge puts your opponent's Mobility slot Mantras on cooldown for 15s. (30s cooldown) (+1 Passive Agility)

talents.name: Maiming Claws
talents.description: Down Comes the Claw now disables your opponent's posture regeneration for 3s on proc. (+1 Passive Agility)
hint: Patch note: 3s was increased to 4s, but description not updated.

talents.name: Turning of the Wheel
talents.description: After perfect dodging a swing or critical attack, step backwards and ramp up your swing speed.

talents.name: Face Cutter
talents.description: Your Spine Cutter now deals an additional hit.
talents.requirement: Spine Cutter, 75 Medium Weapon, Twinblade equipped

categories.name: Twisted Puppets
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of twisted puppets.

talents.name: Wraith Path: Twisted Puppets
talents.description: Your Flamecharm mantras summon puppets of shadow and flame, turning your flames black. Also changes certain weapons' flame color. Two burn types: Shadow Burn (slightly stronger) and Puppet Burn (weaker, spawns Puppets). Puppets deal 20 typeless damage, ignoring armor resistances but not general DR. 4s cooldown between puppet spawns.
hint: Mutually exclusive with Eruption Path: Lava Serpent and Azure Flames.

talents.name: Burning Puppets
talents.description: Your puppets can now inflict Puppet Burn and apply fire-based Talents when they explode. Puppets now scale with Flamecharm, up to 30 damage at 100 Flamecharm.
talents.requirement: Wraith Path: Twisted Puppets, 40 Flamecharm & 40 Shadowcast

talents.name: Burning Sacrifice
talents.description: Sacrifice puppets that have lived half their lifetime (turn purple) for Emperor Flame stacks, boosting your damage and speed for 6s (up to +12% M1 damage at 3 Puppets). Requires a Talent tool.
talents.requirement: Wraith Path: Twisted Puppets, 40 Flamecharm & 40 Shadowcast, Emperor Flame

talents.name: Explosive Rage
talents.description: Causing an explosion (e.g., Explosive Finish, Emperor Flame, Detonation enchant) makes your puppets frenzy for 10s, speeding up and dealing +50% damage (currently bugged).
talents.requirement: Wraith Path: Twisted Puppets, 40 Flamecharm & 40 Shadowcast

talents.name: Moths to a Flame
talents.description: Puppets home in on enemies that are burning from Twisted Puppets' burns, moving faster when close.
hint: They can target allies if those allies are burning with black flames.
talents.requirement: Wraith Path: Twisted Puppets, 40 Flamecharm & 40 Shadowcast

categories.name: Tyrant
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Tyrant.

talents.name: Audacity
talents.description: Once you've brought down your prey, instill fear into all who might interrupt. Creates an AoE stun/slow when you begin gripping. Charmed or nearby enemies are feared for longer; nearby allies gain a 10% damage buff for 40s. (25s cooldown).
hint: Makes you immune to Defiant Until the End and Last Second Negotiation triggers (bugged on NPCs).
Damage buff signified by a white halo effect.

talents.name: No Survivors
talents.description: Your allies and yourself execute faster when affected by Overcharm (0.5s faster).

talents.name: Rule Through Fear
talents.description: Executing an enemy applies Overcharm to nearby allies (and yourself) for 10s.

categories.name: Undying Ember
categories.mystic_dialogue: My spirit is forever burning.

talents.name: Denial Repulse
talents.description: You now emit a delayed burst of flames after coming close to death. When Flame of Denial triggers, release an explosion around you.

talents.name: Undying Flame
talents.description: Your Graceful Flame burns brightly even underwater, restoring sanity and health to those around it. (Also merged with old Soundness of Mind Talent.)

categories.name: Unstable Capacitor
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek to embrace the instability of lightning as a source of power.

talents.name: Surge Path: Unstable Capacitor
talents.description: Your lightning no longer applies Shock; it applies Surge. At max Surge stacks (5 or 4 with Charged Ring), hitting again causes Overload, releasing arcs of lightning. Surge Overload deals base damage plus Thundercall scaling. Surge stacks last 30s and can be used by any Surge user. All your Thundercall effects become blurple.

talents.name: Battery Sapper
talents.description: If your Human Battery targets have Ether, it will drain their Ether to help pay for your Mantras (10s cooldown). Currently bugged and does nothing.
talents.requirement: Surge Path: Unstable Capacitor, 60 Thundercall, 25 Shadowcast

talents.name: Catalytic Strike
talents.description: Posture breaking an enemy will Overload their Surge stacks.

talents.name: Closed Circuit
talents.description: Surge Overloads that fail to arc to other opponents deal extra damage to the Overloaded enemy (+5 damage with 5 Thundercall scaling).

talents.name: Fried Circuits
talents.description: Overloading an enemy applies 'Sapped' for 5s, increasing their mantra cooldowns (like Thunder Wisp).

talents.name: Human Battery
talents.description: When you are out of Ether, convert the Surge stacks of nearby enemies into Ether to pay for your Mantras. Each Surge stack = 10 Ether. Works on Surge stacks not applied by you, but not on your own Surge stacks.

categories.name: Vigil Swordsman
categories.mystic_dialogue: I fight for Maestro Evengarde Rest.

talents.name: Bear Trap
talents.description: Landing a hit with your critical attack makes your opponent unable to jump and slows them for a duration. (+1 Passive Agility)
hint: Effect shown by blood pouring from the legs.

talents.name: Blade Dancer
talents.description: Landing an M1 removes your roll cooldown. (+1 Passive Agility)
hint: Head equipment 'Monastery Cowl' also has this Talent.

talents.name: Speed Demon
talents.description: Your attacks inflict a reduced-strength bleed while you have a speed boost (1s cooldown). (+1 Passive Agility). Bleed is ~15% bonus damage.
hint: Other sources of bleed are 30% bonus damage.

talents.name: Action Surge
talents.description: Adrenaline Surge now increases your swing speed by 0.04 for its duration. (+1 Passive Agility)

talents.name: Air Counter
talents.description: You can now perform an 'Aerial Attack' to catch enemies who jump above you. Briefly hinders them. (5s cooldown) (+5 Passive Agility)

talents.name: Spinning Swordsman
talents.description: Running attacks do +15% extra damage when you have a speed boost. (+1 Passive Agility)

categories.name: Visionshaper
categories.mystic_dialogue: I speak to the Owls.

talents.name: Cheap Trick
talents.description: When hit below half health, briefly disappear and leave behind an illusion clone. Also triggers when you knock an enemy.

categories.name: Vocalist
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of vocalist.

talents.name: Encore
talents.description: Your sing will stun opponents who are already charmed. On proc, applies 0.4s of full stun that can interrupt enemy attacks.
hint: Doesn't affect allies.

categories.name: Vow of Mastery
categories.mystic_dialogue: I create my own vows.

talents.name: Vow of Mastery
talents.description: Grants the Master the power to command their Subject. Initiate by asking the other player if they’d like to make the vow.
hint: Commands given include: Sleep, Drop, Run, Eat, Say (Text), Use, Locate, Leech at base; additional commands at higher Charisma.

talents.name: Command: Live
talents.description: Once per hour, command a servant to defy all odds and live.
hint: Heals the servant if their HP is below 40%.
Cooldown: 10 minutes for Master, 40 minutes for Subject (60 if below 75 Charisma).

talents.name: Command: Summon
talents.description: Command your servant to obey your summons and appear before you regardless of distance.
hint: Teleportation takes a few seconds; any hit cancels it.
Cooldown: 30 seconds for Master, 2 minutes for Subject.

categories.name: Warrior
categories.mystic_dialogue: I enjoy fighting.

talents.name: Chronostasis
talents.description: Landing an M1 or Critical Strike puts the target’s Resonance on cooldown for a short duration.

talents.name: Critical Attack
talents.description: Landing a critical hit restores 30% of your posture.
talents.requirement: Arthur quest right outside of the Garden reservoir

talents.name: Engage
talents.description: Landing an M1 slightly restores some of your Ether.
talents.requirement: Arthur quest right outside of the Garden reservoir

categories.name: Waterborne
categories.mystic_dialogue: Water is my home.

talents.name: Conditioned Swimmer
talents.description: You lose less hunger and thirst while swimming.

talents.name: Scuba Drowner
talents.description: You won't always drown to death when downed in water, preventing fatal drowning.
hint: Prevents death by drowning.

categories.name: Weapon Master
categories.mystic_dialogue: I am a master of all weapons.

talents.name: Brutal Momentum
talents.description: [Heavy Weapons] Successfully dodging gives your next swing hyperarmor.
hint: Works on heavy weapons including Greataxes and Greathammers; proc occurs on parry.

talents.name: Matador
talents.description: Deal +20% more damage to human enemies with hyperarmor.
hint: Doesn't work on non-humanoid monsters.

talents.name: Mercy Kill
talents.description: When you flourish an enemy much weaker than you, they are killed instantly.
talents.requirement: Unbounding (HVY, MED, or LHT), or first-time attunement/physical stat requirement

talents.name: Showstopper
talents.description: When an enemy would roll through your physical attack, stomp the ground to daze nearby foes.

talents.name: Switchblade
talents.description: You can now utilize Dagger Talents even when not wielding a dagger.
talents.requirement: 50 Light Weapon, 50 Medium Weapon/50 Heavy Weapon

talents.name: Warrior's Swing
talents.description: [Heavy Weapons] Reduces incoming damage by 20% if hit during Heavy swing hyperarmor.

categories.name: Whisper
categories.mystic_dialogue: A whisper in the dark.

talents.name: Haunted Gale
talents.description: Every 3 hits with perfectly cast Galebreathe mantras causes a phantom of wind to strike the target.
hint: In PvE, 3 hits may be reduced to 2 if Gale Wisp is active; cap of 2 strikes per enemy per mantra.

categories.name: Windrunner
categories.mystic_dialogue: I move like water.

talents.name: Agility Unbounded
talents.description: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your agility to its fullest.

talents.name: Oath: Arcwarder
talents.description: You vow to be a shield for your comrades, earning extra Mantra slots.
talents.bonus: (+1 Wildcard Mantra Slot, +2 Combat Mantra Slot)
talents.requirement: 20 Fortitude, 20 Flamecharm, 20 Thundercall, Complete Alpha's quest

talents.name: Oath: Bladeharper
talents.description: You vow to carry your blades as instruments, consolidating your fighting style.
talents.requirement: 25 Agility OR 25 Strength, 75 MED OR total of 90 in LHT/HVY, defeat yourself after interacting with a Sky Statue

talents.name: Oath: Blindseer
talents.description: You vow not to let the horrors of the world pierce your blindfold, altering your perception.
talents.bonus: (+10 Sanity, +1 Support Mantra Slot, +1 Wildcard Mantra Slot)
talents.requirement: 40 Willpower, all 3 Mental Fortress Talents, Blindfold, read inscriptions in The Temple of the Forgotten Flame

talents.name: Oath: Contractor
talents.description: Your heart is tied to Zi'eer, the 4th Prophet of the Ministry; you swear to serve under his will.
talents.requirement: Etrea Reputation, Ministry Reputation, learn what happened from Yun'Shul then return to Lord Regent

talents.name: Oath: Chainwarden
talents.description: You vow to bind the wicked and drag them back to justice.
talents.bonus: (+1 Wildcard Mantra Slot, +2 Combat Mantra Slot)
talents.requirement: Combined total of 40 in Strength/Fortitude/Willpower, Authority reputation, defeat Emar Vend

talents.name: Oath: Dawnwalker
talents.description: You vow to reach towards the Light, expelling shadow with your radiance.
talents.requirement: Have 30 Kyrsan Medalions and speak to Klaris

talents.name: Oath: Fadetrimmer
talents.description: You vow to hone your precision with scissors to prevent fringe incidents.
talents.bonus: (+1 Wildcard Mantra Slot, +1 Combat Mantra Slot)
talents.requirement: Power 12, Change your hair 12 times at any Barber

talents.name: Oath: Jetstriker
talents.description: You vow to flow with the Song, drifting to your target when out of range.
talents.bonus: (+1 Wildcard Mantra Slot, +1 Mobility Mantra Slot, +8 Passive Agility)
talents.requirement: 50 Agility, beat Alirian in a race

talents.name: Oath: Linkstrider
talents.description: You vow to sacrifice your own life for your allies, becoming their strength.
talents.bonus: (+1 Wildcard Mantra Slot, +2 Support Mantra Slot)
talents.requirement: Sacrifice 4 players with Oaths OR 4 Scarlet Lotuses in The Entropy Catalyst

talents.name: Oath: Oathless
talents.description: You vow to never be bound by an Oath, living free and unrestrained.
talents.bonus: (+2 Wildcard Mantra Slot, +10 Health, +20% Oath Resistance)
talents.requirement: Talk to Cerulean in the cave near Miner's Landing docks

talents.name: Oath: Saltchemist
talents.description: You vow to dedicate your body and mind to the Material Arts, becoming a vessel of knowledge.
talents.bonus: (+1 Wildcard Mantra Slot, +1 Support Mantra Slot, +20 Carry Load)

talents.name: Oath: Silentheart
talents.description: You vow to reject the Words of the Song, allowing you to wield weapons with half the usual requirements.
talents.requirement: 25 Strength, 25 Agility OR 25 Charisma, 75 in any Weapon stat, be attunement-less, get gripped by any attunement user, visit Beloved Zofia and talk to The Dreadstar

talents.name: Oath: Starkindred
talents.description: You vow to feel the knowledge of all that is, uniting your fragmented self into one.
talents.requirement: 40 Strength, 1 player grip, talk to Samael in the Derelict Highchurch and kill Iblis, The Fallen Angel, then return to Samael

talents.name: Oath: Visionshaper
talents.description: You vow to see only what you choose, bending reality to your will.
talents.bonus: (+1 Support Mantra Slot, +2 Combat Mantra Slots)
talents.requirement: 50 Charisma, Complete Aelita's Encounter, Bring a Dark Feather to Surge

talents.name: Oath: Saintsworn
talents.description: A vow to the fallen heroes; press L to swap to Saintsblade.
talents.bonus: (+2 Combat Mantra Slots, +2 Support Mantra Slots, +1 Wildcard Mantra Slot)
talents.requirement: 20 Flamecharm, 20 Galebreathe, 20 Shadowcast, 20 Frostdraw, 20 Thundercall, resonate with all corresponding pillars and talk to designated NPCs

talents.name: Oath: Soulbreaker
talents.description: The sum of your fragments becomes one. Your Oath joins your distinct selves into a gestalt.
talents.bonus: (+2 Combat Mantra Slot, +1 Mobility Mantra Slot)
talents.requirement: 50 charisma/willpower total, Total hero reputation with Etris, Any murmur Bell, and complete the Yun'shul quest steps

categories.name: Berserker
categories.mystic_dialogue: I seek the qualities of Berserker.

talents.name: Berserker
talents.description: Knocking an enemy grants you 20% damage resistance for 15 seconds.
hint: Works on non-humanoid monsters as well.

talents.name: Blinded
talents.description: Your vision is obscured, evoking memories of your youth, and you gain increased Sanity.
hint: Creates a fog effect; grants immunity to the Flame Blind mantra.

categories.name: Coldseep Reactor
categories.mystic_dialogue: I cultivate protective microorganisms within me.

talents.name: Coldseep Reactor
talents.description: Your helm thrums with a protective field of static electricity and heat, granting full immunity to Second Layer's Parasites.
hint: Obtained from Grand Fisher Helm.

categories.name: Diver's Resilience
categories.mystic_dialogue: I can parry unparryable attacks from giant monsters.

talents.name: Diver's Resilience
talents.description: Allows you to parry most unparryable mob attacks at the cost of reduced mobility.
hint: 10 second cooldown.

categories.name: Full Reset
categories.mystic_dialogue: Knocking an enemy resets your resonance cooldowns.

talents.name: Full Reset
talents.description: Knocking an enemy resets all your resonance cooldowns.
hint: Has a 60 second cooldown.

categories.name: Gourmand
categories.mystic_dialogue: Your hunger and thirst gains from eating are increased.

talents.name: Gourmand
talents.description: Eating increases your hunger and thirst gains.

categories.name: Grotesque Resilience
categories.mystic_dialogue: I reduce damage from harmful DoT effects.

talents.name: Grotesque Resilience
talents.description: Reduces all damage from Damage Over Time effects, including Burn and Bleed.
hint: Reduces Burn by 50% (down to 25% with Flame Within) and Bleed by 25%.
Does not affect certain specific effects.

categories.name: Heavy Haul
categories.mystic_dialogue: Enemies carrying you move significantly slower.

talents.name: Heavy Haul
talents.description: Enemies that carry you move significantly slower.

categories.name: Martyr
categories.mystic_dialogue: Enemies restore only half the usual posture and health when knocking you.

talents.name: Martyr
talents.description: Enemies gain less health and posture when knocking you down.
hint: Restores only half of what would normally be restored.
Negated if enemy has Replenishing Knockout.

categories.name: Pack Mule
categories.mystic_dialogue: I can hold more food.

talents.name: Pack Mule
talents.description: Increases the maximum quantity of food you can hold by 5.

categories.name: Polite Awakening
categories.mystic_dialogue: Recover a portion of your max health after getting up.

talents.name: Polite Awakening
talents.description: Recover 15% of your max health after getting up from being downed.
hint: Only procs when below 20% HP.

categories.name: Ready or Not
categories.mystic_dialogue: The first attack to hit you while out of combat deals half damage.

talents.name: Ready or Not
talents.description: The first attack to hit you while out of combat has its damage cut in half.

categories.name: Replenishing Knockout
categories.mystic_dialogue: Downing enemies replenishes your health and posture.

talents.name: Replenishing Knockout
talents.description: Knocking down enemies replenishes 1.5x more of your health and posture.
hint: Negated if the enemy has the Martyr talent.

categories.name: Return to the Dark Ages
categories.mystic_dialogue: Your mantra damage is reduced, but so is incoming damage.

talents.name: Return to the Dark Ages
talents.description: Your mantra damage is reduced by 20%, but incoming mantra damage is also reduced by 20%.
hint: Also reduces burn dealt by 20%.
Works well with Silentheart.
Mutually exclusive with Everchanging Aegis.

categories.name: Star Duster
categories.mystic_dialogue: I take less damage from airborne enemies.

talents.name: Star Duster
talents.description: You take 10% less damage from airborne enemies.
hint: Obtained from Star Duster equipment.

categories.name: Surestep
categories.mystic_dialogue: My boots secure my footing in all terrain.

talents.name: Surestep
talents.description: Your boots dig into the ground with metal spikes, preventing ragdoll and movement debuffs from the Wind.
hint: Obtained from Delver Boots.

categories.name: Temple Guard
categories.mystic_dialogue: I protect with divine resolve.

talents.name: Temple Guard
talents.description: For the first 0.3s of your Critical Attack's windup, you take 90% less damage from attacks that would cancel your windup.
hint: Procs even if your critical cannot be canceled (Hyper Armor).
Obtained from Monastery Champion Robes.

categories.name: Wormwarder
categories.mystic_dialogue: I ward off parasites with my lantern.

talents.name: Wormwarder
talents.description: Your lantern generates a shroud of static electricity deterring flesh-burrowing parasites.
hint: Makes you immune to the Second Layer's Parasites, but grants a mobility debuff.
